  4303 000016DA 88EC                    		mov	ah, ch		; FAT ID to AH
  4304 000016DC 50                      		push	ax ; (**)	; save boot drive number and media byte
  4305                                  		
  4306                                  ; let model_byte, secondary_model_byte be set here!!!
  4307                                  
  4308 000016DD B4C0                    		mov	ah, 0C0h
  4309 000016DF CD15                    		int	15h	; SYSTEM - GET CONFIGURATION (XT after 1/10/86,AT mdl 3x9,CONV,XT286,PS)
  4310 000016E1 7215                    		jb	short no_rom_system_conf ; just	use Model_Byte
  4311 000016E3 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0
  4312 000016E6 7510                    		jnz	short no_rom_system_conf
  4313                                  
  4314                                  ;		; 20/12/2022
  4315                                  ;		; (Programmer's Guide to the AMIBIOS, page 268)
  4316                                  ;		; (https://stanislavs.org/helppc/int_15-c0.html)
  4317                                  ;
  4318                                  ;		INT 15h, ah = C0h - Return System Configuration Parameters (PS/2 only)
  4319                                  ;
  4320                                  ;		on return:
  4321                                  ;		CF = 0 if successful
  4322                                  ;		   = 1 if error
  4323                                  ;		AH = when CF set, 80h for PC & PCjr, 86h for XT
  4324                                  ;	     	    (BIOS after 11/8/82) and AT (BIOS after 1/10/84)
  4325                                  ;
  4326                                  ;		ES:BX = pointer to system descriptor table in ROM of the format:
  4327                                  ;
  4328                                  ;		Offset Size	     Description
  4329                                  ;
  4330                                  ;		  00   word   length of descriptor (8 minimum)
  4331                                  ;		  02   byte   model byte (same as F000:FFFE, not reliable)
  4332                                  ;		  03   byte   secondary model byte
  4333                                  ;		  04   byte   BIOS revision level (zero based)
  4334                                  ;		  05   byte   feature information, see below
  4335                                  ;		  06   dword  reserved
  4336                                  
  4337                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4338                                  		; ds = cs
  4339 000016E8 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+ROMBIOS_DESC.bios_sd_modelbyte]
  4340 000016EC A2[2D06]                		mov	[model_byte], al
  4341                                  		;mov	[cs:model_byte], al
  4342                                  					; get/save model byte
  4343 000016EF 268A4703                		mov	al, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+ROMBIOS_DESC.bios_sd_scnd_modelbyte]
  4344 000016F3 A2[2E06]                		mov	[secondary_model_byte], al
  4345                                  		;mov	[cs:secondary_model_byte], al
  4346                                  					; get/save secondary model byte
  4347 000016F6 EB0C                    		jmp	short turn_timer_on
  4348                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4349                                  
  4350                                  no_rom_system_conf:			
  4351 000016F8 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh
  4352 000016FB 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
  4353                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4354 000016FD 26A00E00                		mov	al, [es:0Eh]	; get model byte (from 0FFFFh:0Eh)
  4355 00001701 A2[2D06]                		mov	[model_byte], al
  4356                                  		;mov	[cs:model_byte], al ; save model byte
  4357                                  turn_timer_on:				
  4358 00001704 B020                    		mov	al, 20h	; ' '   ; turn on the timer
  4359 00001706 E620                    		out	20h, al		; Interrupt controller,	8259A.
  4360                                  					; AKPORT
  4361                                  
  4362                                  ; some olivetti m24 machines have an 8530 serial communications
  4363                                  ; chip installed at io address 50h and 52h. if we're running
  4364                                  ; on one of those, we must inhibit the normal aux port initialization
  4365                                  
  4366                                  		; 20/12/2022
  4367                                  		; ds = cs
  4368 00001708 803E[2D06]00            		cmp	byte [model_byte], 0
  4369                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0 ; next to last	byte in	rom bios
  4370 0000170D 7510                    		jnz	short not_olivetti_m24 ; skip for all other machines
  4371                                  					; (except olivetti m24)
  4372 0000170F E466                    		in	al, 66h		; is 8530 installed?
  4373 00001711 A820                    		test	al, 20h
  4374 00001713 740A                    		jz	short not_olivetti_m24 ; we're done if not
  4375 00001715 B00F                    		mov	al, 0Fh		; double check
  4376 00001717 E650                    		out	50h, al
  4377 00001719 E450                    		in	al, 50h
  4378 0000171B A801                    		test	al, 1		; this test was	copied from olivetti
  4379 0000171D 7414                    		jz	short skip_aux_port_init ; take	this branch if 8530 installed
  4380                                  
  4381                                  not_olivetti_m24:
  4382 0000171F B003                    		mov	al, 3		; init com4
  4383 00001721 E82208                  		call	aux_init
  4384 00001724 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; init com3
  4385 00001726 E81D08                  		call	aux_init
  4386 00001729 B001                    		mov	al, 1		; init com2
  4387 0000172B E81808                  		call	aux_init
  4388 0000172E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; init com1
  4389 00001730 E81308                  		call	aux_init
  4390                                  
  4391                                  skip_aux_port_init:			
  4392 00001733 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; init lpt3
  4393 00001735 E80608                  		call	print_init
  4394 00001738 B001                    		mov	al, 1		; init lpt2
  4395 0000173A E80108                  		call	print_init
  4396 0000173D 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; init lpt1

  4439                                  ;		; 20/12/2022

  4441                                  ;		Address Size	   Description	 (BIOS/DOS Data Area)
  4442                                  ;	
  4443                                  ;		50:00	byte	Print screen status byte
  4444                                  ;				 00 = PrtSc not active,
  4445                                  ;				 01 = PrtSc in progress
  4446                                  ;				 FF = error

  4448                                  ;		50:04	byte	DOS single diskette mode flag, 0=A:, 1=B:
  4449                                  ;		50:05  10bytes	POST work area
  4450                                  ;		50:0F	byte	BASIC shell flag; set to 2 if current shell
  4451                                  ;		50:10	word	BASICs default DS value (DEF SEG)
  4452                                  ;		50:12	dword	Pointer to BASIC INT 1C interrupt handler
  4453                                  ;		50:16	dword	Pointer to BASIC INT 23 interrupt handler
  4454                                  ;		50:1A	dword	Pointer to BASIC INT 24 disk error handler
  4455                                  ;		50:20	word	DOS dynamic storage
  4456                                  ;		50:22  14bytes	DOS diskette initialization table (INT 1E)
  4457                                  ;		50:30	4bytes	MODE command
  4458                                  ;		70:00		I/O drivers from IO.SYS/IBMBIO.COM

  4749                                  ; scan the list of drives to determine their type. we have three flavors of
  4750                                  ; diskette drives:
  4751                                  ;
  4752                                  ;   48tpi drives    we do nothing special for them
  4753                                  ;   96tpi drives    mark the fact that they have changeline support.
  4754                                  ;   3.5"  drives    mark changeline support and small.
  4755                                  ;
  4756                                  ; the following code uses registers for certain values:
  4757                                  ;
  4758                                  ;   dl - physical drive
  4759                                  ;   ds:di - points to current bds
  4760                                  ;   cx - flag bits for bds
  4761                                  ;   dh - form factor for the drive (1 - 48tpi, 2 - 96tpi, 3 - 3.5" medium)
  4762                                  					
  4763 0000186F 30D2                    		xor	dl, dl
  4764                                  
  4765                                  		; 20/12/2022

  4772 00001876 BF[1901]                		mov	di, start_bds 	; if we	are faking floppy drives we need
  4773                                  					; to set aside two bdss	for the	two fake floppy	drives
  4774                                  
  4775                                  ; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  4776                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.0, MSINIT.ASM)
  4777                                  
  4778                                  ; check to see if we are faking floppy drives. if not we don't
  4779                                  ; do anything special. if we are faking floppy drives we need
  4780                                  ; to set aside two bdss for the two fake floppy drives. we
  4781                                  ; don't need to initalise any fields though. so starting at start_bds
  4782                                  ; use the link field in the bds structure to go to the second bds
  4783                                  ; in the list and initalise it's link field to -1 to set the end of
  4784                                  ; the list. then jump to the routine at dohard to allocate/initialise
  4785                                  ; the bds for harddrives.
  4786                                  
  4787 00001879 803E[8515]01            		cmp	byte [fakefloppydrv], 1
  4788 0000187E 750B                    		jnz	short loop_drive
  4789 00001880 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  4790                                  					; di <-	first bds link
  4791 00001882 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  4792                                  					; di <-	second bds link
  4793 00001884 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; -1 ; set end of link
  4794 00001888 E90801                  		jmp	dohard		; allocate/initialise bds for harddrives

  4826                                  					; DL = drive number
  4827                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  4828                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives

  4830                                  		; 14/12/2023

  4835 000018A8 E98000                  		jmp	noparmsfromrom
  4836                                  
  4837                                  ; if cmos is bad, it gives es,ax,bx,cx,dh,di=0. cy=0.
  4838                                  ; in this case, we are going to put bogus informations to bds table.
  4839                                  ; we are going to set ch=39,cl=9,dh=1 to avoid divide overflow when
  4840                                  ; they are calculated at the later time. this is just for the diagnostic
  4841                                  ; diskette which need msbio,msdos to boot up before it sets cmos.
  4842                                  ; this should only happen with drive b.
  4843                                  
  4844                                  chk_pfr:
  4845 000018AB 80FD00                  		cmp	ch, 0		; if ch=0, then	cl,dh=0	too.
  4846 000018AE 7505                    		jnz	short pfr_ok
  4847                                  
  4848                                  		;mov	ch, 39		; rom gave wrong info.
  4849                                  		;mov	cl, 9		; let's default to 360k.

  4863

  4865                                  		;jbe	short eot_ok

  4891                                  		;  it does not save CX,DX registers before INT 13h func 15h)
  4892                                  		; (this is also a ROMBIOS bug, some ROMBIOSs return number
  4893                                  		;  of sectors in cx:dx pair while others restore cx:dx)
  4894                                  		;  -- ref: Ralf Brown's Interrupt List --

  4896                                  		; ((PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2119h))

  4906                                  					; DL = drive ID

  4908                                  					; CX:DX	= number of sectors on the media

  4930                                  ; and can recognise. for the rest, we set the form factor as "other".

  4933

  5099                                  
  5100                                  ; we need to do special things if we have a single drive system and are setting
  5101                                  ; up a logical drive. it needs to have the same int13 drive number as its
  5102                                  ; counterpart, but the next drive letter. also reset ownership flag.
  5103                                  ; we detect the presence of this situation by examining the flag single for the
  5104                                  ; value 2.
  5105 00001947 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2
  5106 0000194C 7505                    		jnz	short not_special
  5107 0000194E FECF                    		dec	bh		; int13	drive number same for logical drive
  5108 00001950 80F120                  		xor	cl, 20h	; fi_own_physical
  5109                                  					; reset	ownership flag for logical drive
  5110                                  not_special:
  5111                                  
  5112                                  ; the values that we put in for BDS_RBPB.BPB_HEADS and
  5113                                  ; BDS_RBPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK will only remain if the
  5114                                  ; form factor is of type "ffother".
  5115                                  				
  5116 00001953 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; fill BDS for drive

  5224                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5225                                  ; if more than 2 diskette drives on the system, then it is necessary to remap
  5226                                  ; the bds chain to adjust the logical drive num (drive letter) with greater
  5227                                  ; than two diskette drives
  5228                                  ;
  5229                                  ; new scheme:	if more than 2 disktte drives, first map the bds structure
  5230                                  ;		as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the  drive
  5231                                  ;		letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  5232                                  ;		drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  5233                                  ;		and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  5234                                  ;		drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.

  5247                                  ;we now decide, based on the configurations available so far, what
  5248                                  ;code or data we need to keep as a stay resident code. the following table
  5249                                  ;shows the configurations under consideration. they are listed in the order
  5250                                  ;of their current position memory.
  5251                                  ;
  5252                                  ;configuration will be done in two ways:
  5253                                  ;
  5254                                  ;first, we are going to set "static configuration". static configuration will
  5255                                  ;consider from basic configuration to endof96tpi configuration. the result
  5256                                  ;of static configuration will be the address the dynamic configuration will
  5257                                  ;use to start with.
  5258                                  ;
  5259                                  ;secondly, "dynamic configuration" will be performed. dynamic configuration
  5260                                  ;involves possible relocation of code or data. dynamic configuration routine
  5261                                  ;will take care of bdsm tables and at rom fix module thru k09 suspend/resume
  5262                                  ;code individually. after these operation, [dosdatasg] will be set.
  5263                                  ;this will be the place sysinit routine will relocate msdos module for good.

  5347                                  ; M065 -- begin changes
  5348                                  ;
  5349                                  ; On certain systems with Western Digital disk controllers, the
  5350                                  ; following detection scheme caused an unpredictable and serious
  5351                                  ; failure. In particular, they've implemented a nonstandard
  5352                                  ; Int13(ah=16h) which reconfigures the hard drive, depending on
  5353                                  ; what happens to be at es:[bx] and other memory locations indexed
  5354                                  ; off of it.
  5355                                  ;
  5356                                  ; Compaq was unable to tell us exactly which kind of systems have
  5357                                  ; the bug, except that they guarantee that the bug was fixed in
  5358                                  ; ROM BIOSs dated 08/04/86 and later. We'll check for the COMPAQ
  5359                                  ; string, and then look for date codes before 08/04/86 to decide
  5360                                  ; when to install the hook.

  5644                                  loadit:
  5645                                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  5646                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; sysinit segment
  5647                                  		mov	es, ax
  5648                                  		mov	es, [es:CURRENTDOSLOCATION] ; 09/12/2022
  5649                                  		;mov	es, [es:271h]
  5650                                  
  5651                                  		call	getclus		; read cluster at ES:DI (DI is updated)
  5652                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5653                                  ;iseof:
  5654                                  		;;test	byte [cs:fbigfat], fbig
  5655                                  		;test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h ; fbig
  5656                                  		; 12/12/2023
  5657                                  		; ds = cs
  5658                                  		test	byte [fbigfat], 40h ; fbig
  5659                                  		jnz	short eofbig
  5660                                  		cmp	bx, 0FF7h
  5661                                  		jmp	short iseofx
  5662                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5663                                  
  5664                                  eofbig:
  5665                                  		cmp	bx, 0FFF7h
  5666                                  iseofx:
  5667                                  		jb	short loadit	; keep loading until cluster = eof
  5668                                  %endif
  5669                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5670                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5671                                  
  5672 00001AC4 E8BE03                  		call	setdrvparms	; 
  5673                                  
  5674                                  		;;jmp	far ptr	46Dh:267h ; jmp	SYSINIT_SEG:SYSINIT_START
  5675                                  		;jmp	far 46Dh:267h
  5676 00001AC7 EA[6902]2704            		jmp	SYSINITSEG:SYSINITSTART
  5677                                  
  5678                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  5679                                  
  5680                                  ; Following are subroutines to support resident device driver initialization
  5681                                  ;
  5682                                  ;M011 -- note:  deleted setup_bdsms and reset_bdsms here
  5683                                  
  5684                                  ;	M035 -- begin changed section
  5685                                  
  5686                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5687                                  ; module name: remap
  5688                                  ;
  5689                                  ; descriptive name: all the code for himem that could be separated from msbio
  5690                                  ;
  5691                                  ; function:  remap the bds chain to adjusted logical drive numbers (drive
  5692                                  ;	     letters) if more than two diskette drives on the system.
  5693                                  ;
  5694                                  ;     scheme:  if more than 2 diskette drives, first map the bds structure
  5695                                  ;	       as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the drive
  5696                                  ;	       letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  5697                                  ;	       drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  5698                                  ;	       and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  5699                                  ;	       drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.
  5700                                  
  5701                                  ; input:       none
  5702                                  ; exit:	drive letters have been remapped in bds chain
  5703                                  ; exit error:  none
  5704                                  ; called from: msinit
  5705                                  ;
  5706                                  ; notes:  this function  will be called only if more than 2 diskettes are
  5707                                  ;	  found in the system
  5708                                  ;	  this function assumes that there are no more than 26 drives assigned
  5709                                  ;	    this is guaranteed by the code that creates bdss for partitions
  5710                                  ;	  this function assumes that the first entries in the chain are
  5711                                  ;	   floppy drives, and all the rest are hard drives
  5712                                  ;	  will alter the boot drive if necessary to reflect remapping
  5713                                  ;
  5714                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5715                                  
  5716                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5717                                  ; 02/10/2022
  5718                                  
  5719                                  		; 15/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1) IBMBIO.COM
  5720                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2464h)
  5721                                  		; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:1D9Eh)
  5722                                  
  5723                                  remap:		; proc near
  5724                                  
  5725                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5726                                  		; ds = cs
  5727                                  		;mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; get first bds
  5728 00001ACC 8B3E[1901]              		mov	di, [start_bds]
  5729                                  
  5730                                  ; search for 1st fixed disk physical drive num
  5731                                  
  5732                                  drive_loop:
  5733 00001AD0 807D0480                		cmp	byte [di+4], 80h ; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  5734                                  					; first	hard disk??
  5735 00001AD4 7409                    		jz	short fdrv_found ; yes,	continue
  5736 00001AD6 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5737                                  					; get next bds,	assume segment
  5738 00001AD8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, -1 ; 0FFFFh	; last bds?
  5739 00001ADB 75F3                    		jnz	short drive_loop ; loop	if not
  5740 00001ADD EB49                    		jmp	short rmap_exit	; yes, no hard drive on	system
  5741                                  
  5742                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5743                                  ;first disk drive bds, now change the logical drive num to 2 and the subsequent
  5744                                  ;logical drive nums to 3, 4, 5 etc.
  5745                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5746                                  
  5747                                  fdrv_found:
  5748 00001ADF B002                    		mov	al, 2		; start	with logical drv num=2
  5749                                  fdrv_loop:
  5750 00001AE1 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5751 00001AE4 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5752                                  					; ds:di--> next	bds
  5753                                  		;inc	al		; set num for next drive
  5754                                  		; 18/12/2022
  5755 00001AE6 40                      		inc	ax
  5756 00001AE7 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last hard drive ?
  5757 00001AEA 75F5                    		jnz	short fdrv_loop	; no - assign more disk drives
  5758                                  
  5759                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5760                                  ; now, rescan and find bds of 3rd floppy drive and assign next drive letter
  5761                                  ; in al to 3rd. if the current drive letter is past z, then do not allocate
  5762                                  ; any more.
  5763                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5764                                  
  5765                                  		;mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; [start_bds]
  5766                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5767 00001AEC 8B3E[1901]              		mov	di, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  5768 00001AF0 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5769                                  					; ds:di-->bds2
  5770                                  		;mov	ah, [cs:dsktnum] ; get number of floppies to remap
  5771 00001AF2 8A26[2501]              		mov	ah, [dsktnum]
  5772 00001AF6 80EC02                  		sub	ah, 2		; adjust for a:	& b:
  5773                                  remap_loop1:
  5774 00001AF9 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5775                                  					; set new num to next floppy
  5776 00001AFB 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5777 00001AFE FEC0                    		inc	al		; new number for next floppy
  5778 00001B00 FECC                    		dec	ah		; count down extra floppies
  5779 00001B02 75F5                    		jnz	short remap_loop1
  5780                                  
  5781                                  ; now we've got to adjust the boot drive if we reassigned it
  5782                                  
  5783                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5784                                  		;mov	al, [cs:drvfat]
  5785 00001B04 A0[7C15]                		mov	al, [drvfat]
  5786 00001B07 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; is it	a: or b: ?
  5787 00001B09 721D                    		jb	short rmap_exit
  5788                                  		;sub	al, [cs:dsktnum]
  5789 00001B0B 2A06[2501]              		sub	al, [dsktnum]	; is it one of the other floppies?
  5790 00001B0F 7204                    		jb	short remap_boot_flop ;	brif so
  5791                                  
  5792                                  ; we've got to remap the boot hard drive
  5793                                  ; subtract the number of EXTRA floppies from it
  5794                                  
  5795 00001B11 0402                    		add	al, 2		; bootdrv -= (dsktnum-2)
  5796 00001B13 EB04                    		jmp	short remap_change_boot_drv
  5797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5798                                  
  5799                                  ; we've got to remap the boot floppy.
  5800                                  ; add the number of hard drive partitions to it
  5801                                  
  5802                                  remap_boot_flop:
  5803                                  		;add	al, [cs:drvmax]	; bootdrv += (drvmax-dsktnum)
  5804                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5805 00001B15 0206[7500]              		add	al, [drvmax]
  5806                                  remap_change_boot_drv:			
  5807                                  		;mov	[cs:drvfat], al ; alter msdos.sys load drive
  5808 00001B19 A2[7C15]                		mov	[drvfat], al
  5809 00001B1C FEC0                    		inc	al
  5810 00001B1E 1E                      		push	ds
  5811 00001B1F BF2704                  		mov	di, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  5812                                  		;mov	di, 544h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
  5813                                  		;;mov	di, 46Dh	; SYSINIT segment
  5814 00001B22 8EDF                    		mov	ds, di
  5815 00001B24 A2[9802]                		mov	[DEFAULTDRIVE], al
  5816                                  		;mov	ds:296h, al	; [SYSINIT+DEFAULT_DRIVE]
  5817                                  					; pass it to sysinit as	well
  5818 00001B27 1F                      		pop	ds ; ds = cs
  5819                                  rmap_exit:
  5820 00001B28 C3                      		retn
  5821                                  
  5822                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5823                                  
  5824                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5825                                  ; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 -actual-)
  5826                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21 -draft-)
  5827                                  ; 02/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 (MSDOS 3.3)	
  5828                                  ; 19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11)
  5829                                  ;**************************************************
  5830                                  ; getboot - get the boot sector for a hard disk
  5831                                  ;
  5832                                  ; Reads the boot sector from a specified drive into
  5833                                  ; a buffer at the top of memory.
  5834                                  ;
  5835                                  ; dl = int13 drive number to read boot sector for
  5836                                  ;**************************************************
  5837                                  
  5838                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5839                                  bootbias equ 200h
  5840                                  
  5841                                  getboot:	; proc near
  5842                                  
  5843                                  		; 15/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 
  5844                                  		;	 (Modified MSDOS 6.22) IO.SYS
  5845                                  		; ds = cs
  5846                                  		
  5847                                  		; 08/04/2018
  5848                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 (IBMBIO.COM, IBMDOS 2.1)
  5849                                  		; 28/03/2018 - MSDOS 6.0 - MSINIT.ASM, 1991
  5850                                  		; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0
  5851                                  		;	      (disassembled IO.SYS code of MSDOS 5.0)
  5852                                  
  5853                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:init_bootseg] ; 17/10/2022
  5854                                  		; 15/12/2023
  5855 00001B29 A1[7F15]                		mov	ax, [init_bootseg]
  5856 00001B2C 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  5857                                  
  5858                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5859 00001B2E BB0002                  		mov	bx, bootbias ; 200h
  5860                                  		;mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  5861                                  					; load BX, ES:BX is where sector goes
  5862 00001B31 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  5863 00001B34 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  5864 00001B36 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
  5865 00001B39 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  5866                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  5867                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  5868                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  5869 00001B3B 7209                    		jb	short erret
  5870                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5871 00001B3D 26813EFE0355AA          		cmp	word [es:bootbias+1FEh], 0AA55h
  5872                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:3FEh, 0AA55h ; [es:bootbias+1FEh]
  5873                                  					; Dave Litton magic word?
  5874 00001B44 7401                    		jz	short norm_ret	; yes
  5875                                  erret:
  5876 00001B46 F9                      		stc
  5877                                  norm_ret:
  5878 00001B47 C3                      		retn
  5879                                  
  5880                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5881                                  		
  5882                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22)
  5883                                  
  5884                                  chk_partition_type:
  5885                                  		; 16/12/2023
  5886 00001B48 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]	; partition type
  5887                                  
  5888                                  		; see if partitiontype == 1, 4, 6
  5889 00001B4B 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		; FAT12
  5890 00001B4D 7406                    		je	short chk_ptype_retn
  5891 00001B4F 3C04                    		cmp	al, 4		; FAT16 CHS (<= 32MB)
  5892 00001B51 7402                    		je	short chk_ptype_retn
  5893 00001B53 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; FAT16 BIG CHS (> 32MB)
  5894                                  chk_ptype_retn:
  5895                                  		; zf = 1 -> primary DOS partition
  5896                                  		; zf = 0 -> not a primary DOS partition
  5897 00001B55 C3                      		retn
  5898                                  
  5899                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5900                                  
  5901                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 
  5902                                  
  5903                                  ;***************************************************************************
  5904                                  ;   sethard - generate bpb for a variable sized hard file. ibm has a
  5905                                  ;   partitioned hard file; we must read physical sector 0 to determine where
  5906                                  ;   our own logical sectors start. we also read in our boot sector to
  5907                                  ;   determine version number
  5908                                  ;
  5909                                  ;   inputs:	dl is rom drive number (80...)
  5910                                  ;		bh is partition number (0....) 
  5911                                  ;		ds:di points to bds
  5912                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear -> bpb is filled in
  5913                                  ;		carry set   -> bpb is left uninitialized due to error
  5914                                  ;	trashes (at least) si, cx
  5915                                  ;	MUST PRESERVE ES:!!!!
  5916                                  ;***************************************************************************
  5917                                  
  5918                                  sethard:	; proc near
  5919                                  		; 16/12/2023
  5920                                  		; 12/08/2023
  5921                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  5922 00001B56 57                      		push	di
  5923 00001B57 53                      		push	bx
  5924                                  		;push	ds  ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA ; 14/08/2023
  5925 00001B58 06                      		push	es
  5926 00001B59 885D05                  		mov	[di+5],	bl	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5927 00001B5C 885504                  		mov	[di+4],	dl	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  5928 00001B5F 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  5929                                  					; fnon_removable
  5930 00001B63 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  5931                                  					; ffHardFile
  5932 00001B67 C606[7E15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit FAT
  5933 00001B6C 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; partition number
  5934 00001B6E 52                      		push	dx
  5935 00001B6F B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  5936 00001B71 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  5937                                  					; DL = drive number
  5938                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  5939                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  5940                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  5941 00001B73 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  5942 00001B75 887515                  		mov	[di+15h], dh	; [di+BDS.heads] ; get number of heads
  5943 00001B78 5A                      		pop	dx
  5944 00001B79 7249                    		jb	short setret	; error	if no hard disk
  5945 00001B7B 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  5946 00001B7E 884D13                  		mov	[di+13h], cl	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  5947 00001B81 52                      		push	dx		; save partition number
  5948 00001B82 E8A4FF                  		call	getboot
  5949 00001B85 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore partition number
  5950 00001B86 723C                    		jb	short setret
  5951 00001B88 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  5952                                  
  5953                                  ; The first 'active' partition is 00, the second is 01....
  5954                                  ;   then the remainder of the 'primary' but non-active partitions
  5955                                  
  5956                                  act_part:
  5957 00001B8B 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h ; is the partition active?
  5958 00001B90 740B                    		jz	short no_act	; no
  5959                                  ; 16/12/2023
  5960                                  %if 0
  5961                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; reject if partitiontype != 1, 4 or 6
  5962                                  		jz	short got_good_act
  5963                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  5964                                  		jz	short got_good_act
  5965                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  5966                                  		jnz	short no_act
  5967                                  %endif
  5968                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22)
  5969                                  		; check if it is a primary dos partition
  5970                                  
  5971 00001B92 E8B3FF                  		call	chk_partition_type
  5972 00001B95 7506                    		jne	short no_act
  5973                                  
  5974                                  got_good_act:
  5975 00001B97 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition #?
  5976 00001B99 742D                    		jz	short set2	; WE GOT THE ONE WANTED!!
  5977 00001B9B FECE                    		dec	dh		; count	down
  5978                                  no_act:
  5979 00001B9D 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  5980 00001BA0 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  5981                                  					; last entry done?
  5982 00001BA4 75E5                    		jnz	short act_part	; no, process next entry
  5983 00001BA6 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  5984                                  					; restore original value of bx
  5985                                  
  5986                                  ; Now scan the non-active partitions
  5987                                  
  5988                                  get_primary:				
  5989 00001BA9 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h
  5990 00001BAE 750B                    		jnz	short not_prim	; we've already scanned
  5991                                  					; the ACTIVE ones
  5992                                  ; 16/12/2023
  5993                                  %if 0
  5994                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; see if partitiontype == 1, 4 or 6
  5995                                  		jz	short got_prim
  5996                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  5997                                  		jz	short got_prim
  5998                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  5999                                  		jnz	short not_prim
  6000                                  %endif
  6001                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22)
  6002                                  		; check if it is a primary dos partition
  6003                                  
  6004 00001BB0 E895FF                  		call	chk_partition_type
  6005 00001BB3 7506                    		jne	short not_prim
  6006                                  
  6007                                  got_prim:
  6008 00001BB5 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition?
  6009 00001BB7 740F                    		jz	short set2
  6010 00001BB9 FECE                    		dec	dh
  6011                                  not_prim:
  6012 00001BBB 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6013 00001BBE 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6014 00001BC2 75E5                    		jnz	short get_primary ; loop till we've gone through table
  6015                                  setret:					
  6016 00001BC4 F9                      		stc			; error	return
  6017 00001BC5 E98502                  		jmp	ret_hard_err
  6018                                  
  6019                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6020                                  
  6021                                  ;  until we get the real logical boot record and get the bpb,
  6022                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be used instead of BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  6023                                  ;  for the convenience of the computation.
  6024                                  ;
  6025                                  ;  at the end of this procedure, if a bpb information is gotten from
  6026                                  ;  the valid boot record, then we are going to use those bpb information
  6027                                  ;  without change.
  6028                                  ;
  6029                                  ;  otherwise, if (hidden sectors + total sectors) <= a word, then we will move
  6030                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS (low) to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and zero out
  6031                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS entry to make it a conventional bpb format.
  6032                                  
  6033                                  set2:
  6034                                  		; 12/08/2023
  6035                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment (0070h)
  6036 00001BC8 8816[8115]              		mov	[rom_drv_num], dl
  6037                                  		;mov	[cs:rom_drv_num], dl
  6038                                  			; save the rom bios drive number we are handling now.
  6039 00001BCC 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]	; hidden sectors (start	sector)
  6040 00001BD0 268B5706                		mov	dx, [es:bx+6]
  6041                                  
  6042                                  ; decrement the sector count by 1 to make it zero based. exactly 64k
  6043                                  ; sectors should be allowed	
  6044                                  
  6045 00001BD4 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6046 00001BD7 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0
  6047 00001BDA 26034708                		add	ax, [es:bx+8]	; sectors in partition
  6048 00001BDE 2613570A                		adc	dx, [es:bx+10]
  6049 00001BE2 7305                    		jnc	short okdrive
  6050 00001BE4 800E[7E15]80            		or	byte [fbigfat], 80h ; ftoobig
  6051                                  okdrive:
  6052 00001BE9 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]
  6053 00001BED 894517                  		mov	[di+17h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6054                                  					; BPB_HIDDENSECTORS = p->partitionbegin
  6055 00001BF0 268B4706                		mov	ax, [es:bx+6]
  6056 00001BF4 894519                  		mov	[di+19h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  6057 00001BF7 268B570A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+10]	; # of sectors (high)
  6058 00001BFB 268B4708                		mov	ax, [es:bx+8]	; # of sectors (low)
  6059 00001BFF 89551D                  		mov	[di+1Dh], dx	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]

  6503                                  ; ****** cas ---
  6504                                  ; IBM DOS 3.30 doesn't seem to mind that the TOTAL_SECTORS and
  6505                                  ; BIG_TOTAL_SECTORS field in the boot sector are 0000. This
  6506                                  ; happens with some frequency -- perhaps through some OS/2 setup
  6507                                  ; program. We haven't actually been COPYING the TOTAL_SECTORS
  6508                                  ; from the boot sector into the DPB anyway, we've just been using
  6509                                  ; it for calculating the fat size. Pretty scary, huh? For now,
  6510                                  ; we'll go ahead and copy it into the DPB, except in the case

  6738                                  
  6739                                  ; we don't need to change "small fat" logic since it is guaranteed
  6740                                  ; that double word total sector will not use 12 bit fat (unless
  6741                                  ; it's sectors/cluster >= 16 which will never be in this case.)
  6742                                  ; so in this case we assume dx = 0 !!
  6743                                  
  6744 00001DD7 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; 12 bit fat (FAT12 fs)
  6745 00001DD9 88EB                    		mov	bl, ch

  6749 00001DE0 43                      		inc	bx		; BDS.secperclus

  6751 00001DE4 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  6752 00001DE6 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1
  6753 00001DE8 01F3                    		add	bx, si		; number of FAT bytes ; 08/08/2023
  6754 00001DEA 81C3FF01                		add	bx, 511		; bx +=	511 + bx/2
  6755 00001DEE D0EF                    		shr	bh, 1		; bh >>= 1; (=bx/512)

  6761                                  ; for bigfat we do need to extend this logic to 32 bit sector calculation.
  6762                                  
  6763                                  dobig:					
  6764 00001DF5 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6765 00001DF7 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)
  6766 00001DF8 8B550C                  		mov	dx, [di+0Ch]	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6767 00001DFB D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl		; root dir sectors = BDS.direntries / 16;
  6768 00001DFD 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
  6769 00001DFF 5A                      		pop	dx
  6770 00001E00 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= total	sectors	- root dir sectors
  6771 00001E03 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6772 00001E06 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= t - r	- d
  6773                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs
  6774 00001E09 B302                    		mov	bl, 2
  6775 00001E0B 8A7D08                  		mov	bh, [di+8]	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6776                                  					; bx = 256 * BDS.secperclus + 2
  6777                                  
  6778                                  ; I don't understand why to add bx here!!!
  6779                                  
  6780                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  6781                                  		; 27/09/2022
  6782                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  6783                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  6784                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  6785                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6786                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6787                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32)
  6788                                  		;   TmpVal2 = TmpVal2 / 2;
  6789                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6790                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  6791                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32) {
  6792                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = 0;
  6793                                  		;   BPB_FATSz32 = FATSz;
  6794                                  		;} else {
  6795                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz);
  6796                                  		;/* there is no BPB_FATSz32 in a FAT16 BPB */
  6797                                  		;}
  6798                                  					; dx:ax = TmpVal1, bx = TmpVal2
  6799 00001E0E 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; 
  6800 00001E10 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2
  6801 00001E13 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		
  6802 00001E16 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2-1
  6803                                  
  6804                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6805                                  
  6806 00001E19 F7F3                    		div	bx		; BDS.fatsecs =
  6807                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))
  6808 00001E1B 894511                  		mov	[di+11h], ax	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6809                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  6810                                  
  6811                                  ; now, set the default filesys_id, volume label, serial number
  6812                                  
  6813                                  		; 05/08/2023

  6816                                  		;;mov	bl, ds:fbigfat

  6849                                  ; set according to the partition information. we are going to
  6850                                  ; see if (hidden sectors + total sectors) > a word. if it is true,
  6851                                  ; then no change. otherwise, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be moved
  6852                                  ; to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be set to 0.

  7211                                  
  7212                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7213                                  ;
  7214                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7215                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7216                                  ;
  7217                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7218                                  ;
  7219                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7220                                  ;   initialize it.
  7221                                  ;
  7222                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7223                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7224                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7225                                  ;
  7226                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7227                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7228                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7229                                  ;
  7230                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7231                                  ;   save coding.
  7232                                  ;
  7233                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7234                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7235                                  ;
  7236                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7237                                  ;
  7238                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7239                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7240                                  ;
  7241                                  ; called modules:
  7242                                  ;		  getboot
  7243                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7244                                  ;
  7245                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7246                                  ;
  7247                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7248                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7249                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7250                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7251                                  ;
  7252                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7253                                  
  7254                                  		; 18/12/2023
  7255                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7256                                  domini:
  7257 00001F4F 8A36[F515]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7258                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7259 00001F53 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7260                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7261 00001F55 742E                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7262 00001F57 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7263                                  domini_loop:

  7266 00001F5E B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7267 00001F60 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7268                                  					; DL = drive number
  7269                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7270                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7271                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7272                                  		
  7273                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7274                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h

  7277                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7278 00001F62 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax

  7280 00001F66 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)

  7282                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7283                                  		;mov	al, cl

  7291 00001F72 8A16[F415]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]

  7293                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias

  7304                                  
  7305                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7306                                  
  7307                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7308                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7309                                  
  7310                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7311                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7312                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7313                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7314                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7315                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7316                                  ;
  7317                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7318                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7319                                  
  7320                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7321 00001F86 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7322                                  fmpnext:				
  7323 00001F8A 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7324 00001F8E 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7325 00001F90 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7326 00001F93 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7327 00001F97 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7328                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7329                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7330                                  fmpnextfound:
  7331 00001F99 C3                      		retn
  7332                                  
  7333                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7334                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7335                                  ;fmpret:
  7336                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7337                                  
  7338                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7339                                  
  7340                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7341                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.
  7342 00001F9A E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7343 00001F9D 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7344 00001F9F 8B3E[F815]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free bds
  7345 00001FA3 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7346                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7347 00001FA8 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7348                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7349                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7350 00001FAC C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7351                                  					; ffHardFile
  7352 00001FB0 C606[7E15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7353 00001FB5 A1[FA15]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7354 00001FB8 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7355 00001FBB A1[FC15]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7356 00001FBE 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7357 00001FC1 A0[F415]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7358 00001FC4 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7359                                  					; set physical number
  7360 00001FC7 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7361 00001FCA 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7362                                  					; set logical number
  7363 00001FCD 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7364 00001FD2 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7365 00001FD4 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7366                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7367 00001FD9 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7368                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7369                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7370 00001FDB 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7371 00001FDE 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7372 00001FE2 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7373 00001FE5 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7374 00001FE7 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7375 00001FE9 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7376 00001FED 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7377                                  					; set hidden trks
  7378 00001FF0 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7379 00001FF4 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7380 00001FF8 8A16[F415]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7381 00001FFC BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7382 00001FFF B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7383 00002002 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7384                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7385                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7386                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7387 00002004 7293                    		jc	short fmpnextfound
  7388 00002006 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7389                                  
  7390                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7391                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7392 00002009 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7393 0000200F 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7394                                  
  7395                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7396                                  		;push	es
  7397 00002011 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7398                                  					; bx value saved.
  7399                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7400 00002014 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7401 00002016 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7402                                  fmpnextchain:
  7403 00002019 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7404                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7405                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7406                                  
  7407                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7408                                  ;fmpnextfound:
  7409                                  		;retn
  7410

  7412                                  
  7413                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7414                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7415                                  
  7416                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7417                                  	
  7418 0000201C 57                      		push	di
  7419 0000201D 53                      		push	bx
  7420                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7421                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7422                                  		;push	ds
  7423 0000201E 06                      		push	es
  7424                                  setmini_1:				
  7425 0000201F 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7426 00002023 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7427 00002025 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7428 00002029 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7429 0000202B 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7430 0000202F 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7431 00002031 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7432 00002034 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7433 00002038 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7434 0000203A F9                      		stc
  7435 0000203B 07                      		pop	es
  7436                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7437                                  		;pop	ds
  7438 0000203C 5B                      		pop	bx
  7439 0000203D 5F                      		pop	di
  7440 0000203E C3                      		retn
  7441

  7443                                  setmini_2:
  7444 0000203F E986FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7445
