 11573 00000B82 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11574 00000B84 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 11575                                  noxor:
 11576 00000B88 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 11577                                  disk_ret:
 11578 00000B8C F8                      		clc
 11579 00000B8D C3                      		retn
 11580                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11581                                  
 11582                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11583                                  
 11584                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11585                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11586                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11587                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11588                                  
 11589                                  do_write:
 11590 00000B8E 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11591 00000B92 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11592 00000B94 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11593 00000B98 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11594                                  do_norm:
 11595 00000B9A E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11596 00000B9D EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11597                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11598                                  
 11599                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11600                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11601                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11602                                  
 11603                                  doverify:
 11604 00000B9F 58                      		pop	ax
 11605 00000BA0 50                      		push	ax
 11606 00000BA1 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11607 00000BA3 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 11608 00000BA6 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11609                                  
 11610                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11611                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11612                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11613                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11614                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11615                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11616                                  
 11617 00000BA8 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11618 00000BAB 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11619 00000BAD FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11620 00000BB1 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11621 00000BB3 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11622 00000BB6 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11623                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11624                                  
 11625                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 11626 00000BB8 E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 11627 00000BBB FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11628 00000BBF EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11629                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11630                                  
 11631                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11632                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11633                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11634                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11635                                  
 11636                                  dskerr:
 11637 00000BC1 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 11638 00000BC6 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11639 00000BC8 E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 11640                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 11641 00000BCB 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11642 00000BD0 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11643 00000BD2 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11644 00000BD5 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11645                                  dochkagain:
 11646 00000BDA E8A900                  		call	again
 11647                                  dskerr0:
 11648 00000BDD 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11649 00000BDF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11650                                  					; fnon_removable
 11651 00000BE4 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11652 00000BE6 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11653 00000BE9 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11654                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 11655 00000BEB 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11656 00000BEE 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11657 00000BF0 C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11658                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11659                                  dskerr1:
 11660 00000BF6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11661                                  		;jmp	retry
 11662                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11663 00000BF7 E9FBFE                  		jmp	_retry
 11664                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11665                                  
 11666                                  write_fault_err:
 11667 00000BFA BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11668                                  					; for write fault error.
 11669 00000BFD EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11670                                  
 11671                                  		; fall into harderr
 11672                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11673                                  
 11674                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11675                                  
 11676                                  harderr:
 11677 00000BFF E84C00                  		call	maperror
 11678                                  harderr2:
 11679 00000C02 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11680                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11681 00000C07 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11682 00000C0B 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11683                                  
 11684                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11685                                  
 11686                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11687                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11688 00000C0F E916FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11689                                  
 11690                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11691                                  
 11692                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11693                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11694                                  
 11695                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11696                                  normspeed:
 11697 00000C12 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11698 00000C17 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11699 00000C19 06                      		push	es
 11700 00000C1A 50                      		push	ax
 11701 00000C1B A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11702 00000C1E C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11703 00000C22 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11704 00000C26 58                      		pop	ax
 11705 00000C27 07                      		pop	es
 11706 00000C28 E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 11707                                  		; 24/12/2023
 11708                                  		;push	es
 11709                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 11710                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11711                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 11712                                  		;pop	es
 11713 00000C2B 1E                      		push	ds
 11714 00000C2C C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11715 00000C30 C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 11716 00000C34 1F                      		pop	ds
 11717                                  
 11718 00000C35 C3                      		retn
 11719                                  
 11720                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11721                                  
 11722                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11723                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11724                                  
 11725                                  fastspeed:
 11726 00000C36 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11727                                  					; ftoobig
 11728 00000C3B 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11729 00000C3D 06                      		push	es
 11730 00000C3E 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11731 00000C42 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11732 00000C44 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11733 00000C48 07                      		pop	es
 11734 00000C49 C3                      		retn
 11735                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11736                                  
 11737                                  notready:
 11738 00000C4A F9                      		stc
 11739 00000C4B B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11740 00000C4D C3                      		retn
 11741                                  
 11742                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11743                                  
 11744                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11745                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11746                                  
 11747                                  maperror:
 11748 00000C4E 51                      		push	cx
 11749 00000C4F 06                      		push	es
 11750 00000C50 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11751 00000C51 07                      		pop	es
 11752 00000C52 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11753 00000C54 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11754                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11755 00000C57 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11756                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11757 00000C5A BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11758 00000C5D F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11759                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11760                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11761                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11762 00000C5F 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11763                                  					; get translation
 11764                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11765                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11766 00000C62 07                      		pop	es
 11767 00000C63 59                      		pop	cx
 11768 00000C64 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11769 00000C65 C3                      		retn
 11770                                  
 11771                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11772                                  
 11773                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11774                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11775                                  
 11776                                  set_tim:
 11777 00000C66 50                      		push	ax
 11778 00000C67 E8B1F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11779                                  
 11780                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11781                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11782                                  
 11783 00000C6A 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11784 00000C6E 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11785 00000C70 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11786                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11787                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11788 00000C74 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11789                                  setaccess:
 11790 00000C76 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11791 00000C7B 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11792 00000C7F 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11793                                  done_set:
 11794 00000C83 F8                      		clc
 11795                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11796 00000C84 58                      		pop	ax
 11797 00000C85 C3                      		retn
 11798                                  
 11799                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11800                                  
 11801                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11802                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11803                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11804                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11805                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11806                                  
 11807                                  again:	
 11808 00000C86 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11809 00000C89 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11810 00000C8C 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11811                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11812 00000C8E 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11813 00000C8F C3                      		retn
 11814                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11815                                  
 11816                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 11817 00000C90 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11818 00000C92 C3                      		retn

 11835                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11836                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed

 11924                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11925                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11926                                  ;
 11927                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11928                                  ;
 11929                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11930                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11931                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11932                                  ;
 11933                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11934                                  
 11935                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11936                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11937                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11938 00000CC3 E8A4F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11939 00000CC6 06                      		push	es
 11940 00000CC7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11941 00000CCB 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11942                                  					; RAWIO
 11943 00000CD0 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11944 00000CD4 07                      		pop	es
 11945 00000CD5 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11946                                  
 11947                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11948                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11949                                  
 11950                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11951 00000CD7 BE[940C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11952                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11953                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11954 00000CDA A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11955 00000CDC 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11956                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11957 00000CDE BE[A70C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11958                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11959                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11960                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11961 00000CE1 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11962 00000CE3 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11963 00000CE5 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11964 00000CE8 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11965 00000CEA 98                      		cbw
 11966 00000CEB D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11967 00000CED 46                      		inc	si
 11968 00000CEE 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11969 00000CF0 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11970                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11971 00000CF3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11972                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11973                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11974 00000CF8 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11975 00000CFA C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11976                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11977                                  
 11978                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11979                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11980                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11981 00000CFB 5A                      		pop	dx

 11983                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11984 00000CFC E9D6F3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 11989                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11990                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11991                                  ;
 11992                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11993                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11994                                  ;
 11995                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11996                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11997                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11998                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11999                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12000                                  
 12001                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12002                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 12003                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 12004                                  
 12005 00000CFF C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12006 00000D03 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12007                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 12008 00000D06 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12009 00000D0A 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 12010 00000D0D 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12011 00000D11 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 12012                                  					; Mask off other bits
 12013 00000D14 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 12014 00000D17 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]

 12222                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12223                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12224                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12225                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12226                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12227                                  ;
 12228                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12229                                  ;
 12230                                  ; output:
 12231                                  ;	for status call:
 12232                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12233                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12234                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12235                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12236                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12237                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12238                                  ;
 12239                                  ;	for format track:
 12240                                  ;		carry set if error
 12241                                  ;
 12242                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12243                                  
 12244                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12245                                  
 12246                                  		; 19/10/2022

 12394 00000F01 8B0E[2805]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 12395                                  
 12396                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12397                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12398                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12399                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12400                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12401                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12402                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12403                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12404                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 12405                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 12406                                  		; register.
 12407                                  
 12408                                  					; Special function requested?

 12511                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12512                                  
 12513                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12514                                  ;
 12515                                  ; TrackIo:
 12516                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12517                                  ;
 12518                                  ;   input:
 12519                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12520                                  ;		  3 = write
 12521                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12522                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12523                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12524                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12525                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12526                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12527                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12528                                  ;
 12529                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12530                                  
 12531                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12532                                  		
 12533                                  		; 19/10/2022

 12535                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to

 12554                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration

 12644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12685                                  ; SetDASD
 12686                                  ;

 12693                                  
 12694                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12695                                  SetDasd:
 12696 00000FF8 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12697                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12698 00000FFD 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd

 12700 00000FFF 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 12707                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12708                                  DoSetDasd:
 12709 0000100B C606[2806]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it

 12711 00001015 B004                    		mov	al, 4

 12762                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12763                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12764 0000104C 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]

 12768                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12769                                  
 12770                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12771                                  
 12772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12773                                  ;
 12774                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12775                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12776                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12777                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12778                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12779                                  ;
 12780                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12781                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12782                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12783                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12784                                  ;
 12785                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12786                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12787                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12788                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12789                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12790                                  ;
 12791                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12792                                  
 12793                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12794                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12795 00001055 51                      		push	cx
 12796 00001056 52                      		push	dx
 12797                                  
 12798                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12799                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12800                                  
 12801 00001057 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12802 0000105C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12803 0000105E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12804 00001060 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12805 00001065 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12806 00001067 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12807                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12808                                  
 12809                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12810 00001069 06                      		push	es
 12811 0000106A 56                      		push	si
 12812                                  		
 12813                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12814                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12815 0000106B 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12816 0000106D 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12817                                  
 12818 0000106F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12819                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12820                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12821 00001074 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12822 00001078 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12823                                  
 12824                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12825                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12826                                  
 12827 0000107C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12828 00001081 5E                      		pop	si
 12829 00001082 07                      		pop	es
 12830                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12831 00001083 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12832 00001087 49                      		dec	cx
 12833 00001088 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12834 0000108B D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12835 0000108D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12836 0000108F 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12837 00001091 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]

 12842 0000109C 57                      		push	di
 12843 0000109D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12844 0000109F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12845                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12846 000010A1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12847 000010A3 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12848 000010A8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12849 000010AA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12850                                  
 12851                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12852                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12853 000010AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12854 000010AD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12855 000010AF 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12856                                  
 12857 000010B0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12858                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12859                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12860 000010B5 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si

 12862                                  
 12863                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12864                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12865                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12866                                  		;mov	es, si
 12867 000010BD 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023

 12930                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12931                                  ;
 12932                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12933                                  ;
 12934                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12935                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12936                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12937                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12938                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 12952                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.

 12958                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 12960                                  					; Zap up the speed

 12968                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12969                                  ;
 12970                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12971                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12972                                  ;
 12973                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12974                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12975                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12976                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12977                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12978                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12979                                  ;
 12980                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12981                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12982                                  ;
 12983                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13042                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 13044                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13045                                  
 13046                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13047                                  ;
 13048                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13049                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13050                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13051                                  ;
 13052                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13053                                  
 13054                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13055                                  ioctl_getown:
 13056 00001155 E812F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13057 00001158 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13058                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13059 0000115C C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13060                                  ownloop:				
 13061 00001160 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13062 00001164 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13063                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13064 00001166 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13065                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13066                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13067 0000116B 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13068                                  getnextBDS:				
 13069 0000116D 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13070 00001170 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13071                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13072                                  
 13073                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13074                                  ;
 13075                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13076                                  ; in al to al.
 13077                                  ;
 13078                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13079                                  
 13080                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13081                                  ioctl_setown:
 13082 00001172 E8F5F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13083 00001175 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13084                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13085 0000117A E84CF7                  		call	checksingle
 13086                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13087 0000117D FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13088                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13089                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13090                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13091                                  
 13092                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13093                                  ;
 13094                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13095                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13096                                  ;
 13097                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13098                                  
 13099                                  exitown:				
 13100 00001181 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13101                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13102 00001183 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13103                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13104                                  					; fi_am_mult
 13105 00001188 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult

 13107                                  					; Get logical drive number
 13108                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13109 0000118E FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13110                                  exitnomult:				
 13111 00001190 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 13112 00001194 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 13113                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13114                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13115                                  		; cf=0
 13116                                  		;clc
 13117 00001197 C3                      		retn

 13176                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13177                                  ;	get media id
 13178                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13179                                  ;
 13180                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13181                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13182                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13183                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13184                                  ;
 13185                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13186                                  ;
 13187                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13188                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13189                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13190                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13191                                  ;
 13192                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13193                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13194                                  ;
 13195                                  ; LOGIC:
 13196                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13197                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13198                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13199                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13200                                  ;
 13201                                  ; {
 13202                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13203                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13204                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13205                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13206                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13207                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13208                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13209                                  ;		};
 13210                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13211                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13212                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13213                                  ;		};
 13214                                  ;	else
 13215                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13216                                  ;
 13217                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13218                                  
 13219                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13220                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13221                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13222                                  
 13223                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13224                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13225                                  GetMediaId:
 13226 000011C0 E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13227 000011C3 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13228 000011C7 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13229 000011CC E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13230 000011CF 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13231                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13232 000011D1 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13233                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13234                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13235                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13236 000011D6 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13237                                  
 13238                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13239 000011D8 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13240 000011DB 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13241                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13242                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13243 000011DE 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13244 000011E0 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13245 000011E4 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13246                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13247 000011E8 46                      		inc	si
 13248                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13249                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13250 000011E9 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13251                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13252 000011EC B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13253                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13254                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13255 000011EF F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13256                                  	
 13257                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13258                                  		; cf = 0
 13259                                  		;clc
 13260                                  
 13261 000011F1 C3                      		retn
 13262                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13263                                  
 13264                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13265                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13266 000011F2 F9                      		stc	
 13267                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13268 000011F3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13269                                  		;stc
 13270                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13271                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13272 000011F5 C3                      		retn
 13273                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13274                                  
 13275                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13276                                  
 13277                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13278                                  ;  set media id
 13279                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13280                                  
 13281                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13282                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13283                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13284                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13285                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13286                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13287                                  ;
 13288                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13289                                  ;
 13290                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13291                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13292                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13293                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13294                                  ;
 13295                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13296                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13297                                  ;
 13298                                  ; logic:
 13299                                  ;
 13300                                  ; {
 13301                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13302                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13303                                  ;	BootIo;
 13304                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13305                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13306                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13307                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13308                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13309                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13310                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13311                                  ;		};
 13312                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13313                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13314                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13315                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13316                                  ;		};
 13317                                  ;	else
 13318                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13319                                  ;
 13320                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13321                                  
 13322                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13323                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13324                                  SetMediaId:
 13325 000011F6 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13326 000011F9 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13327                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13328 000011FD 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13329 000011FF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13330 00001204 52                      		push	dx
 13331 00001205 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13332 00001208 5A                      		pop	dx
 13333 00001209 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13334                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13335 0000120B 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13336                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13337 00001210 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13338                                  		
 13339 00001212 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13340                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13341                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13342                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13343 00001217 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 13344                                  
 13345 00001219 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13346 0000121A 57                      		push	di
 13347 0000121B 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13348 0000121C 07                      		pop	es
 13349 0000121D BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13350 00001220 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13351 00001224 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13352 00001227 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13353                                  
 13354                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13355                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13356                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13357                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13358                                  		;rep movsb
 13359 0000122A E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 13360                                  
 13361 0000122D 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13362 0000122E 1F                      		pop	ds

 13364 00001230 07                      		pop	es

 13366 00001234 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13367 00001236 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13368 0000123B E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.

 13370                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13371                                  					; return with error code from BootIo

 13384                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13385                                  
 13386                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13387                                  ;	BootIo
 13388                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13389                                  ;
 13390                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13391                                  ;
 13392                                  ; input :
 13393                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13394                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13395                                  ;
 13396                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13397                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13398                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13399                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13400                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13401                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13402                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13403                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13404                                  ;
 13405                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13406                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13407                                  ;
 13408                                  ; logic:
 13409                                  ;
 13410                                  ; {
 13411                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13412                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13413                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13414                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13415                                  ; }
 13416                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13417                                  
 13418                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13419                                  BootIo:	
 13420 00001244 06                      		push	es
 13421 00001245 57                      		push	di
 13422 00001246 53                      		push	bx
 13423 00001247 1E                      		push	ds
 13424 00001248 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13425                                  
 13426                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13427                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13428                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13429                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13430                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13431                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13432                                  
 13433 00001249 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13434 0000124C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13435 0000124E 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13436 00001252 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13437 00001255 E8FBF6                  		call	diskio
 13438 00001258 5B                      		pop	bx
 13439 00001259 5F                      		pop	di
 13440 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 13441 0000125B C3                      		retn
 13442                                  
 13443                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13444                                  
 13445                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13446                                  
 13447                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13448                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13449                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13450                                  ;
 13451                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13452                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13453                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13454                                  ; history in the flags.
 13455                                  ;
 13456                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13457                                  ;
 13458                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13459                                  ;
 13460                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13461                                  ;
 13462                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13463                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13464                                  ;
 13465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13466                                  
 13467                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13468 0000125C 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13469 00001260 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13470 00001262 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13471                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13472 00001264 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13473                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13474                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13475 00001269 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13476 0000126B 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13477 00001270 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13478 00001272 E8EA06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13479 00001275 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13480                                  
 13481                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13482                                  
 13483 00001277 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13484 00001279 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13485                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13486                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13487 0000127B 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13488 0000127D 53                      		push	bx
 13489 0000127E BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13490                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13491                                  					; physical drive
 13492 00001281 E8B406                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13493 00001284 5B                      		pop	bx
 13494                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13495 00001285 C3                      		retn
 13496                                  
 13497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13498                                  
 13499                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13500                                  
 13501                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13502                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13503                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13504                                  ;
 13505                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13506                                  ;
 13507                                  ; INPUT :
 13508                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13509                                  ;
 13510                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13511                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13512                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13513                                  
 13514                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13515                                  GetAccessFlag:
 13516 00001286 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13517 0000128A C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13518                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13519                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13520 0000128D 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13521                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13522 0000128F 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13523                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13524                                  					; unformatted_media
 13525 00001294 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13526                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13527                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13528 00001296 40                      		inc	ax
 13529                                  GafDone:
 13530 00001297 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13531 0000129A C3                      		retn
 13532                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13533                                  
 13534                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13535                                  
 13536                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13537                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13538                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13539                                  ;
 13540                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13541                                  ;
 13542                                  ; input :
 13543                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13544                                  ;
 13545                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13546                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13547                                  
 13548                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13549                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13550 0000129B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13551 0000129F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13552                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13553 000012A2 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13554                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13555                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13556 000012A7 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13557 000012AB 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13558                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13559 000012AD 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13560                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13561                                  					; unformatted_media
 13562                                  saf_Done:				
 13563 000012B2 C3                      		retn
 13564                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13568                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13569                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13570                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13571                                  ;
 13572                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13573                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13574                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13575                                  ;
 13576                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13577                                  
 13578                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13579                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13580 000012B3 06                      		push	es
 13581 000012B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13582 000012B8 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13583                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13584                                  
 13585                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13586                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13587                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13588                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13589                                  
 13590 000012BC 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13591                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13592 000012BE 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13593                                  ioctl_support:
 13594 000012C0 0E                      		push	cs
 13595 000012C1 07                      		pop	es
 13596                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13597                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13598 000012C2 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13599                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13600 000012C5 BF[B80C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13601                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13602                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13603 000012C8 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13604 000012CA F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13605 000012CC 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13606 000012CE B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13607                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13608                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13609                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13610                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13611                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13612                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13613                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13614 000012D1 07                      		pop	es
 13615                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13616                                  		; cf = 0
 13617                                  		;clc
 13618 000012D2 C3                      		retn
 13619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13620                                  nosupport:
 13621 000012D3 07                      		pop	es
 13622 000012D4 E9FEED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13623                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
