 15011 0000179C B8004A                  		mov	ax, 4A00h	; multMULT<<8)|multMULTSWPDSK

 15065                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15066 000017C5 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15067 000017C7 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15067 000017D0 736B6574746520666F-
 15067 000017D9 7220647269766520   
 15068                                  
 15069                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15070 000017E1 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15070 000017EA 65737320616E79206B-
 15070 000017F3 6579207768656E2072-
 15070 000017FC 656164790D0A       
 15071 00001802 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15072                                  
 15073                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15074                                  
 15075                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15076                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15077                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15078                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15079                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15080                                  
 15081                                  chkopcnt:		
 15082 00001804 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15083 00001809 C3                      		retn
 15084                                  
 15085                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15086                                  
 15087                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15088                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15089                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15090                                  ;
 15091                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15092                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15093                                  
 15094                                  mediacheck:	
 15095 0000180A E8BCF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15096 0000180D 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15097 0000180F E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15098 00001812 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15099 00001814 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15100 00001817 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15101 00001819 50                      		push	ax
 15102 0000181A 52                      		push	dx
 15103 0000181B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15104                                  					; set logical drive number
 15105 0000181F B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15106 00001821 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15107                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15108                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15109 00001823 5A                      		pop	dx
 15110 00001824 58                      		pop	ax
 15111 00001825 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15112 00001827 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15113                                  
 15114                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15115                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15116                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15117                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15118                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15119                                  ; status.
 15120                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15121 0000182A 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15122 0000182E 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15123                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15124                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15125                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15126                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15127 00001832 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15128                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15129                                  
 15130                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15131                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15132                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15133                                  
 15134 00001834 50                      		push	ax
 15135 00001835 51                      		push	cx
 15136 00001836 52                      		push	dx
 15137 00001837 E8B6ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15138 0000183A 5A                      		pop	dx
 15139 0000183B 59                      		pop	cx
 15140 0000183C 58                      		pop	ax
 15141 0000183D 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15142 0000183F 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15143                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15144 00001841 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15145                                  mediaret:				
 15146 00001843 C3                      		retn
 15147                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15148                                  
 15149                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15150                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15151                                  ; or write.
 15152                                  
 15153                                  mediadovolid:				
 15154 00001844 E849EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15155 00001847 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15156 00001849 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15157 0000184C 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15158 0000184E E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15159                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15160                                  
 15161                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15162                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15163                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15164                                  ; dos.
 15165                                  ;
 15166                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15167                                  
 15168                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15169                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15170                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15171                                  
 15172                                  checklatchio:	
 15173                                  
 15174                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15175                                  			
 15176 00001851 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15177 00001854 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15178                                  
 15179                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15180                                  
 15181 00001856 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15182 00001859 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15183                                  
 15184                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15185                                  ; expensive verification.
 15186                                  
 15187 0000185B E832EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15188 0000185E 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15189 00001860 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15190 00001863 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15191 00001865 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15192 00001867 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15193 00001869 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15194                                  checklatchret:				
 15195 0000186C E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15196                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15197 0000186F F9                      		stc
 15198 00001870 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15199                                  checkret:				
 15200 00001871 C3                      		retn
 15201                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15202                                  
 15203                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15204                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15205                                  ;
 15206                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15207                                  
 15208                                  checkfatvid:				
 15209 00001872 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15210 00001875 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15211 00001877 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15212                                  
 15213                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15214                                  
 15215                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15216                                  
 15217                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15218                                  
 15219                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15220                                  ;
 15221                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15222                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15223                                  ;
 15224                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15225                                  ;
 15226                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15227                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15228                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15229                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15230                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15231                                  ;
 15232                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15233                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15234                                  ; routine.)
 15235                                  ;
 15236                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15237                                  
 15238                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15239                                  check_vid:
 15240                                  
 15241                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15242                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15243                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15244                                  
 15245 00001879 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15246                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15247                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15248 0000187E 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15249 00001880 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15250 00001883 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15251 00001885 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15252 00001887 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15253                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15254 0000188C 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15255                                  					; if not fat system
 15256 0000188E E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15257 00001891 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15258 00001893 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15259 00001896 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15260                                  					; definitely changed
 15261 00001899 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15262                                  
 15263 0000189B 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15264                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15265 0000189C E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15266                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15267                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15268                                  		;clc
 15269                                  checkfatret:				
 15270 0000189F C3                      		retn
 15271                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15272                                  
 15273                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15274                                  changed_drv:
 15275 000018A0 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15276 000018A1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15277                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15278 000018A6 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15279                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15280                                  
 15281                                  ; extended id check
 15282                                  
 15283                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15284                                  
 15285                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15286                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15287                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15288                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15289                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15290                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15291                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15292                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15293                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15294                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15295                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15296                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15297                                  ;
 15298                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15299                                  
 15300                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15301                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15302 000018A7 50                      		push	ax
 15303                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15304                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15305 000018A8 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15306                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15307 000018AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15308 000018AD 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15309 000018B1 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15310 000018B3 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15311 000018B6 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15312 000018BA 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15313                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15314                                  					; don't know
 15315 000018BC 58                      		pop	ax
 15316 000018BD EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15317                                  					; reset the flag
 15318                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15319                                  
 15320                                  ext_changed:
 15321 000018BF 58                      		pop	ax
 15322                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15323 000018C0 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15324                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15325                                  					; disk changed!
 15326                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15327                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15328                                  		;clc
 15329 000018C1 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15330                                  
 15331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15332                                  
 15333                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15334                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15335                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15336                                  ;
 15337                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15338                                  
 15339                                  checkio:				
 15340 000018C3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15341 000018C6 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15342 000018C8 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15343 000018CB 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15344 000018CD E8C0ED                  		call	GetBp
 15345 000018D0 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15346 000018D2 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15347 000018D5 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15348 000018D7 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15349 000018D9 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15350 000018DB 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15351 000018DC C3                      		retn
 15352                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15353                                  
 15354                                  checkioerr:				
 15355 000018DD E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15356                                  
 15357                                  checkioret:				
 15358 000018E0 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15359 000018E1 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 15360                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15361                                  
 15362                                  no_error_map:				
 15363 000018E4 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15364                                  
 15365                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15366                                  
 15367                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15368                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15369                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15370                                  
 15371                                  returnvid:		
 15372 000018E7 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15373                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15374 000018EA E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15375 000018ED B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15376 000018EF F9                      		stc
 15377 000018F0 C3                      		retn
 15378                                  
 15379                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15380                                  
 15381                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15382                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15383                                  ;
 15384                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15385                                  ; **trashes si**
 15386                                  
 15387                                  media_set_vid:				
 15388 000018F1 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15389                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15390                                  
 15391                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15392                                  
 15393                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15394                                  
 15395                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15396                                  
 15397                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15398                                  vid_into_packet:
 15399 000018F4 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15400 000018F5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15401 000018F9 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15402 000018FC 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15403 000018FE 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15404 00001901 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15405 00001904 1F                      		pop	ds
 15406                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15407 00001905 C3                      		retn
 15408                                  
 15409                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15410                                  
 15411                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15412                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15413                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15414                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15415                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15416                                  ;
 15417                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15418                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15419                                  ;
 15420                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15421                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15422                                  ;		carry set
 15423                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15424                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15425                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15426                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15427                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15428                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15429                                  ;
 15430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15431                                  
 15432                                  hidensity:
 15433                                  
 15434                                  ; check for correct drive
 15435                                  		
 15436                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15437 00001906 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15438                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15439                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15440 0000190B 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15441                                  
 15442                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15443                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15444                                  
 15445 0000190D 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15446 00001912 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15447                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15448                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15449 00001914 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15450 00001917 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15451                                  
 15452                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15453                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15454                                  
 15455                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15456 00001919 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15457 0000191D 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15458                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15459                                  					; ffOther
 15460 0000191F 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15461 00001921 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15462                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15463                                  					; ff288
 15464 00001923 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15465 00001925 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15466 00001927 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15467                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15468                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15469 0000192A B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15470                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15471                                  					; 2 sides
 15472                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15473 0000192D 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15474 0000192E BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15475                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15476                                  					; & head max
 15477                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15478 00001931 E9C5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15480                                  
 15481                                  Is720K:
 15482                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15483 00001934 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15484                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15485 00001935 E98EED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15486                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15487                                  
 15488                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15489                                  ;dofloppy:
 15490                                  		;retn
 15491                                  
 15492                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15493                                  
 15494                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15495                                  
 15496                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15497                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15498                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15499                                  ;
 15500                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15501                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15502                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15503                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15504                                  ;
 15505                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15506                                  ;
 15507                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15508                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15509                                  
 15510                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15511 00001938 06                      		push	es
 15512 00001939 57                      		push	di
 15513                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15514                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15515 0000193A C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15516                                  
 15517                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15518                                  
 15519                                  scan_bds:				
 15520 0000193E 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15521 00001942 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15522                                  
 15523                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15524                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15525                                  
 15526 00001944 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15527                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15528                                  get_next_bds:				
 15529 00001948 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15530                                  					; go to	next bds
 15531 0000194B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15532 0000194E 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15533 00001950 5F                      		pop	di
 15534 00001951 07                      		pop	es
 15535 00001952 C3                      		retn
 15536                                  
 15537                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15538                                  
 15539                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15540                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15541                                  ;
 15542                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15543                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15544                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15545                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15546                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15547                                  
 15548                                  checkromchange:	
 15549                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15550                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15551 00001953 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15552                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15553                                  					; fchanged
 15554 00001958 C3                      		retn
 15555                                  
 15556                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15557                                  
 15558                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15559                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15560                                  ;
 15561                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15562                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15563                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15564                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15565                                  
 15566                                  resetchanged:	
 15567                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15568                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15569 00001959 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15570                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15571                                  					; ~fchanged
 15572 0000195E C3                      		retn
 15573                                  
 15574                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15575                                  
 15576                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15577                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15578                                  ;
 15579                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15580                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15581                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15582                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15583                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15584                                  
 15585                                  haschange:
 15586                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15587                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15588 0000195F 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15589                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15590                                  					; fchangeline
 15591 00001964 C3                      		retn
 15592                                  
 15593                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15594                                  
 15595                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15596                                  
 15597                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15598                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15599                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15600                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15601                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15602                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15603                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15604                                  
 15605                                  ; set_volume_id
 15606                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15607                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15608                                  ;
 15609                                  ;   on entry:
 15610                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15611                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15612                                  ;
 15613                                  ;   on exit:
 15614                                  ;	carry clear:
 15615                                  ;	   successful call
 15616                                  ;	carry set
 15617                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15618                                  
 15619                                  set_volume_id:				
 15620 00001965 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15621 00001966 50                      		push	ax
 15622 00001967 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15623 0000196A 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15624 0000196C E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15625 0000196F 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15626 00001971 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15627 00001974 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15628                                  setvret:				
 15629                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15630                                  		; cf = 0
 15631                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15632 00001977 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15633 00001978 5A                      		pop	dx
 15634 00001979 C3                      		retn
 15635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15636                                  
 15637                                  seterr:					
 15638 0000197A 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15639 0000197B 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15640 0000197C C3                      		retn
 15641                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15642 0000197D 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15643                                  
 15644                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15645                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15646                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15647                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15648                                  
 15649                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15650                                  
 15651                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15652                                  
 15653                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15654                                  ;
 15655                                  ;   on entry:
 15656                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15657                                  ;
 15658                                  ;   on exit:
 15659                                  ;	carry clear
 15660                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15661                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15662                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15663                                  ;
 15664                                  ;	carry set:
 15665                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15666                                  
 15667                                  read_volume_id:
 15668 0000197F 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15669 00001980 51                      		push	cx
 15670 00001981 53                      		push	bx
 15671 00001982 50                      		push	ax
 15672 00001983 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15673 00001984 57                      		push	di
 15674 00001985 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15675 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 15676 00001987 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15677 0000198A BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15678                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15679 0000198D B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15680 00001990 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15681 00001992 5F                      		pop	di
 15682 00001993 07                      		pop	es
 15683 00001994 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15684                                  					; # of fats
 15685 00001998 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15686                                  					; sectors / fat
 15687 0000199C F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15688 0000199E 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15689                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15690                                  					;
 15691                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15692                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15693 000019A2 2EA3[7D19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15694                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15695                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15696 000019A6 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15697                                  					; # root dir entries
 15698 000019AA B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15699 000019AC D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15700                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15701                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15702 000019AE 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15703                                  next_sec:
 15704 000019AF 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15705 000019B0 2EA1[7D19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15706                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15707                                  					; get sector #
 15708 000019B4 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15709                                  					; sectors / track
 15710 000019B8 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15711 000019BA F7F1                    		div	cx
 15712                                  
 15713                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15714                                  
 15715 000019BC 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15716                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15717 000019BD 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15718 000019BF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15719 000019C1 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15720                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15721 000019C5 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15722 000019C7 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15723 000019C9 E83BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15724                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15725 000019CC 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15726 000019CE B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15727 000019D1 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15728                                  fvid_loop:
 15729                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15730 000019D3 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15731                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15732 000019D5 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15733 000019D7 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15734 000019DA 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15735 000019DC 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15736 000019DF 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15737                                  ent_loop:
 15738 000019E1 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15739 000019E4 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15740 000019E6 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15741 000019E7 2EFF06[7D19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15742                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15743                                  					; next sector
 15744 000019EC E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15745                                  notfound:
 15746                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15747                                  		;xor	si, si
 15748 000019EE EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15749                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15750                                  
 15751                                  found_vid:
 15752                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15753                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15754 000019F0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15755 000019F1 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15756 000019F3 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15757 000019F4 57                      		push	di
 15758 000019F5 1E                      		push	ds
 15759 000019F6 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15760 000019F7 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15761 000019FA B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15762                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15763 000019FD F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15764                                  		;xor	al, al
 15765                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15766 000019FF 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15767 00001A00 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15768                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15769                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15770                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15771 00001A01 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15772 00001A02 07                      		pop	es
 15773                                  fvid_ret:
 15774                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15775 00001A03 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15776                                  				
 15777 00001A05 58                      		pop	ax
 15778                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15779                                  		; cf = 0
 15780                                  		;clc
 15781                                  rvidret:
 15782 00001A06 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15783 00001A07 59                      		pop	cx
 15784 00001A08 5A                      		pop	dx
 15785 00001A09 C3                      		retn
 15786                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15787                                  
 15788                                  no_vid:
 15789 00001A0A 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15790                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15791                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15792 00001A0B EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15794                                  
 15795                                  readviderr:
 15796 00001A0D 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15797 00001A0E 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15798 00001A0F EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15799                                  
 15800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15801                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15802                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15803                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15804 00001A11 BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15805                                  		;
 15806                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15807                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15808                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15809                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15810 00001A14 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15811 00001A17 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15812                                  		;
 15813 00001A1A FC                      		cld
 15814 00001A1B C3                      		retn
 15815                                  
 15816                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15817                                  
 15818                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15819                                  ;
 15820                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15821                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15822                                  
 15823                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15824 00001A1C 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15825                                  		;push	si
 15826 00001A1D 51                      		push	cx
 15827                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15828 00001A1E 56                      		push	si
 15829                                  
 15830                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15831                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15832                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15833                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15834                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15835                                  		;cld
 15836                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15837 00001A1F E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15838                                  
 15839 00001A22 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15840                                  		
 15841                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15842 00001A24 5E                      		pop	si
 15843                                  chk_volid_ok:
 15844 00001A25 59                      		pop	cx
 15845                                  		;pop	si
 15846 00001A26 5F                      		pop	di
 15847 00001A27 C3                      		retn
 15848                                  
 15849                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15850                                  
 15851                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15852                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15853                                  ;
 15854                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15855                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15856                                  
 15857                                  check_volume_id:
 15858 00001A28 57                      		push	di
 15859 00001A29 51                      		push	cx
 15860                                  		
 15861                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15862                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15863                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15864                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15865                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15866                                  		;cld
 15867                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15868 00001A2A E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15869                                  
 15870 00001A2D F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15871                                  		
 15872                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15873                                  		;pop	cx
 15874                                  		;pop	di
 15875                                  		;retn
 15876 00001A2F EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 15877                                  
 15878                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15879                                  
 15880                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15881                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15882                                  ;
 15883                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15884                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15885                                  ;
 15886                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15887                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15888                                  ;
 15889                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15890                                  
 15891                                  fat_check:
 15892 00001A31 50                      		push	ax
 15893 00001A32 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15894 00001A34 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15895 00001A37 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15896                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15897 00001A3B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15898 00001A3D 4E                      		dec	si
 15899                                  okret1:
 15900 00001A3E 58                      		pop	ax
 15901 00001A3F C3                      		retn
 15902

 15906                                  		;times 7 db 0

 15909

 15911                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15912                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15913

 15915

 15920                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15921

 15923                                  		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15924                                  %endif
