 31745                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31746                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 31747                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31748                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 31749                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 31750                                  ; USES:   Flags
 31751                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31752                                  
 31753                                  isSysMCB:
 31754                                  	;push	ax
 31755                                  
 31756                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31757                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31758                                  	;je	short ism10
 31759                                  	;cmp	ax,JapanPSPOwner	; 9 (for Japan) is valid
 31760                                  	;;je	short ism10
 31761                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 31762                                  	;jne	short ismX
 31763 00002C14 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 31764 00002C1A 7507                    	jne	short ismX 
 31765                                  ism10:	
 31766                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 31767                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 31768 00002C1C 26813E08005343          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 31769                                  ismX:	
 31770                                  	;pop	ax
 31771 00002C23 C3                      	retn

 31774                                  
 31775                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31776                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 31777                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31778                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 31779                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 31780                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 31781                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31782                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31783                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 31784                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 31785                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 31786                                  ;      ...
 31787                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 31788                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31789                                  
 31790                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31791                                  AddrToUmb:
 31792                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31793                                  	;push	cx
 31794                                  	;push	dx
 31795 00002C24 06                      	push	es
 31796                                  
 31797 00002C25 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 31798                                  
 31799 00002C27 E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 31800 00002C2A 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 31801                                  
 31802                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31803                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 31804 00002C2C 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 31805                                  
 31806                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31807                                  atu10:
 31808 00002C2E 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 31809                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31810                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 31811                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 31812                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 31813                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31814                                  
 31815                                  ;atu10:	
 31816                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 31817 00002C30 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 31818 00002C32 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 31819                                  
 31820 00002C34 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 31821 00002C37 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 31822                                  
 31823 00002C39 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 31824                                  atu20:	
 31825                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31826                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31827                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31828                                  	; ax = es
 31829                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31830 00002C3A 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31831 00002C3F 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31832 00002C45 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31833                                  
 31834                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 31835                                  
 31836                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31837                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 31838                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31839 00002C47 40                      	inc	ax
 31840                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31841                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31842 00002C48 EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 31843                                  
 31844                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31845                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 31846                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 31847                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31848                                  
 31849                                  atu30:	
 31850                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31851                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 31852                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31853                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 31854 00002C4A 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 31855 00002C4C 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 31856                                  atuE:	
 31857 00002C4E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 31858 00002C50 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 31859                                  atuX:	
 31860 00002C51 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 31861                                  	
 31862 00002C53 07                      	pop	es	
 31863                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31864                                  	;pop	dx
 31865                                  	;pop	cx
 31866 00002C54 C3                      	retn
 31867                                  
 31868                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31869                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 31870                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 31871                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 31872                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 31873                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31874                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 31875                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 31876                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31877                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31878                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31879                                  
 31880                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31881                                  convUMB:
 31882 00002C55 2E833E[582B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31883 00002C5B 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 31884 00002C5D E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 31885                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31886                                  	;jne	short cu10
 31887                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31888                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31889 00002C60 40                      	inc	ax
 31890 00002C61 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31891 00002C63 48                      	dec	ax
 31892                                  cu10:	
 31893 00002C64 C3                      	retn

 31923                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31924                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 31925                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31926                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 31927                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 31928                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 31929                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31930                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 31931                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31932                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 31933                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 31934                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 31935                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 31936                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31937                                  
 31938                                  loadLow:

 31941                                  	;pop	ds

 31945                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 31946                                  	jne	short ll10
 31947                                  
 31948                                  	stc
 31949                                  ll15:
 31950                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 31951                                  	;stc
 31952                                  	;jmp	short llX
 31953                                  	retn
 31954                                  ll10:	
 31955                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 31956                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 31957                                  
 31958                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31959                                  	retn
 31960                                  
 31961                                  	;mov	al,1
 31962                                  	;clc
 31963                                  ;llX:
 31964                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 31965                                  	;retn
 31966                                  
 31967                                  %endif

 32430                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32431                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32432                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32433                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32434                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32435                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32436                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32437                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32438                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32439                                  
 32440                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32441                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 32442                                  findUMB:
 32443                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32444                                  	;push	ax
 32445                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32446 00002D2D 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32447                                  	;push	dx
 32448                                  
 32449 00002D2E 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32450                                  
 32451 00002D30 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 32452                                  
 32453 00002D32 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32454                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32455                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32456 00002D35 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32457                                  
 32458                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32459                                  fu10:
 32460 00002D37 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32461                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32462                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32463                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32464                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32466                                  
 32467                                  ;fu10:	
 32468 00002D39 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32469 00002D3B 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32470                                  
 32471 00002D3D E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32472 00002D40 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32473                                  
 32474 00002D42 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32475                                  fu20:	
 32476                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32477                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32478                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32479 00002D43 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32480 00002D49 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32481                                  
 32482                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32483                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32484                                  	; ax = es
 32485                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 32486                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32487 00002D4B 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32488 00002D50 40                      	inc	ax
 32489                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32490                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32491 00002D51 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32492                                  fuE:	
 32493 00002D53 F9                      	stc
 32494                                  fuX:
 32495                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32496                                  	;pop	dx
 32497                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32498 00002D54 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32499                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32500 00002D55 C3                      	retn
 32501                                  
 32502                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32503                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32504                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32505                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32506                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32507                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32508                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32509                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32510                                  
 32511                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32512                                  BigFree:
 32513                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32514                                  	;push	bx
 32515 00002D56 51                      	push	cx
 32516                                  
 32517 00002D57 E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32518 00002D5A 723A                    	jc	short bfX
 32519                                  
 32520 00002D5C 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32521 00002D5E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32522                                  
 32523                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32524                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32525                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32526                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32527                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32528                                  
 32529                                  bf10:	
 32530 00002D60 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32531 00002D63 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32532                                  
 32533                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32534 00002D65 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32535 00002D6B 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32536                                  
 32537 00002D6D 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32538                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32539 00002D71 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32540                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32541                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32542 00002D73 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32543                                  
 32544 00002D75 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32545                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32546 00002D77 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32547                                  bf20:	
 32548                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32549                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32550                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32551                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32552 00002D79 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32553 00002D7F 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32554                                  
 32555                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32556 00002D81 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32557                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32558 00002D83 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32559 00002D88 40                      	inc     ax
 32560 00002D89 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32561                                  
 32562 00002D8B EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32563                                  
 32564 00002D8D 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32565 00002D8F 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32566 00002D91 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32567 00002D93 7501                    	jnz	short bfX
 32568                                  bfE:	
 32569 00002D95 F9                      	stc				; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32570                                  bfX:
 32571 00002D96 59                      	pop	cx
 32572                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32573                                  	;pop	bx
 32574 00002D97 C3                      	retn
 32575

 32605 00002D9C 8A87[071F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]

 32615                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32616                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32617                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32618                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32619                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32620                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32621                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32622                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32623                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32624                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32625                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32626                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32627                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32628                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32629                                  
 32630                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ 20h
 32631                                  
 32632                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32633                                  
 32634                                  shrinkMCB:
 32635                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32636                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32637                                  	;push	bx
 32638 00002DA3 51                      	push	cx
 32639 00002DA4 06                      	push	es
 32640                                  
 32641 00002DA5 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32642                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32643                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32644                                  
 32645 00002DA7 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32646                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32647 00002DAC 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32648                                  
 32649 00002DAE 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32650                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32651                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32652                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32653                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32654                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32655                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32656 00002DB1 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32657 00002DB3 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32658                                  
 32659 00002DB5 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32660                                  	
 32661                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32662                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32663 00002DBA 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32664                                  
 32665 00002DBC 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32666 00002DC1 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32667                                  
 32668 00002DC7 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32669 00002DC9 40                      	inc	ax
 32670 00002DCA 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32671                                  
 32672 00002DCC 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32673 00002DCE 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32674                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32675                                  	; ax > 0
 32676 00002DD0 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32677                                  
 32678                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32679 00002DD1 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32680                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32681 00002DD6 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32682                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32683                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32684                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32685                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32686                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32687                                  
 32688                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32689 00002DDA E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32690                                  
 32691                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32692                                  	; cf=0
 32693                                  	;clc
 32694                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32695                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32696                                  smE:	
 32697                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32698                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32699                                  	;stc
 32700                                  smX:	
 32701                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32702 00002DDD 07                      	pop	es
 32703 00002DDE 59                      	pop	cx
 32704                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32705                                  	;pop	bx
 32706 00002DDF C3                      	retn
 32707                                  
 32708                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32709                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32710                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32711                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32712                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32713                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32714                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32715                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32716                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32717                                  ;
 32718                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32719                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32720                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32721                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32722                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32723                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32724                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32725                                  ;       Endif
 32726                                  ;    Endif
 32727                                  ; Endif
 32728                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32729                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32730                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32731                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32732                                  ;    ENDIF
 32733                                  ; ENDIF
 32734                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32735                                  
 32736                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32737                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32738                                  _hideUMB_:
 32739                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32740                                  	; ds = cs
 32741                                  
 32742                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32743                                  	;push	bx
 32744                                  	;push	dx
 32745 00002DE0 06                      	push	es
 32746                                  
 32747 00002DE1 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32748 00002DE3 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32749 00002DE6 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32750                                  
 32751 00002DE8 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32752 00002DEA E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32753 00002DED 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32754                                  
 32755 00002DEF 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32756 00002DF0 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32757 00002DF2 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32758 00002DF5 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32759                                  
 32760 00002DF6 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32761 00002DF8 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32762                                  
 32763 00002DFA 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32764 00002DFC 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32765                                  
 32766 00002DFE 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32767 00002E00 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32768 00002E03 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32769                                  hu_10:	
 32770                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32771                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32772                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32773                                  ;isTiny:
 32774                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32775                                  	;or	al,al
 32776 00002E05 800E[031F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32777 00002E0A 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32778                                  
 32779 00002E0C E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32780 00002E0F 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32781                                  
 32782 00002E11 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 32783 00002E13 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 32784                                  
 32785 00002E15 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 32786 00002E17 E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 32787 00002E1A 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 32788                                  
 32789 00002E1C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32790                                  hu_30:	
 32791 00002E1E 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32792                                  
 32793 00002E20 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 32794                                  
 32795 00002E23 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 32796 00002E25 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 32797                                  
 32798 00002E27 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 32799 00002E29 E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 32800                                  hu_X:	
 32801 00002E2C 07                      	pop	es
 32802                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32803                                  	;pop	dx
 32804                                  	;pop	bx
 32805 00002E2D C3                      	retn
 32806                                  
 32807                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32808                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 32809                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32810                                  ; Entry:  None
 32811                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 32812                                  ; Error:  None
 32813                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32814                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32815                                  
 32816                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32817                                  UnFreeze:
 32818                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32819                                  	;push	ax
 32820 00002E2E 06                      	push	es
 32821                                  
 32822 00002E2F E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32823 00002E32 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 32824                                  
 32825                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32826                                  uf10:
 32827 00002E34 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 32828                                  
 32829                                  ; ------------------------------
 32830                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32831                                  ; ------------------------------
 32832                                  
 32833                                  ;uf10:	
 32834 00002E36 E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 32835 00002E39 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 32836 00002E3B E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 32837                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32838                                  	; ax <> es
 32839 00002E3E 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *

 32841                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]

 32846                                  
 32847                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32848                                  	; 22/07/2023

 32854                                  	; 22/07/2023

 32861 00002E51 C3                      	retn

 32863                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32864                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN

 32893                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32894 00002E75 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32895                                  ifmX:	
 32896                                  	;pop	ax
 32897 00002E7C C3                      	retn

 32899                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32900                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0

 32916                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32917                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 32918                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 32921                                  ; Error:  None

 32946                                  
 32947                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32948                                  fum10:

 32950

 32962                                  fum20:

 32996                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 33000                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 33001                                  ; ERROR:    None

 33029                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33030                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear if UMBs are linked
 33031                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33032                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 33033                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 33034                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33035                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33036                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33037                                  
 33038                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33039                                  	; (SYSINIT:3541h)
 33040                                  
 33041                                  WalkMem:
 33042                                  	;push	ax ; ?
 33043                                  	;push	bx ; ?
 33044                                  	;;push	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:352Fh)
 33045                                  	;push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 33046

 33056                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer

 33061                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33062                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33063 00002EF1 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33064 00002EF7 7408                    	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 33065

 33067

 33070                                  	;add	bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]

 33073                                  	; 22/07/2023

 33077 00002EFE 40                      	inc	ax
 33078                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 33079                                  	
 33080 00002EFF EBEE                    	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 33081                                  um20:	
 33082                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33083                                  	; ax = es
 33084                                  	;mov	ax,es
 33085

 33088                                  	;pop	es ; ?
 33089                                  	;;pop	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:353Dh)
 33090                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 33091                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 33092                                  	
 33093 00002F04 C3                      	retn

 33223                                  ;; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33224                                  ;;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 33225                                  ;; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33226                                  ;; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 33227                                  ;; EXIT:     None
 33228                                  ;; ERROR:    None
 33229                                  ;; USES:     AX, BX
 33230                                  ;; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33231                                  ;
 33232                                  ;he_unlink:
 33233                                  ;	xor	bh, bh
 33234                                  ;
 33235                                  ;	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 33236                                  ;	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 33237                                  ;
 33238                                  ;	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 33239                                  ;	int	21h
 33240                                  ;	retn
 33241                                  ;
 33242                                  ;%endif
 33243                                  
 33244                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33245                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 33246                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33247                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 33248                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 33249                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 33250                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33251                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33252                                  
 33253                                  FreeUMBs:
 33254 00002F34 50                      	push	ax
 33255 00002F35 06                      	push	es
 33256                                  
 33257 00002F36 E86700                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 33258 00002F39 721C                    	jc	short fusX
 33259                                  fus10:
 33260 00002F3B 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 33261                                  ;fus10:	
 33262 00002F3D E81A00                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 33263 00002F40 7505                    	jnz	short fus20
 33264 00002F42 E84000                  	call	freeMCB
 33265                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33266                                  	; ax <> es
 33267 00002F45 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33268                                  fus20:	   
 33269                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33270                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33271                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33272 00002F47 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33273 00002F4D 7408                    	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 33274                                  	
 33275                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33276                                  	; ax = es
 33277                                  	;mov	ax,es
 33278 00002F4F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33279 00002F54 40                      	inc	ax
 33280                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33281                                  	;mov	es,ax
 33282 00002F55 EBE4                    	jmp	short fus10	; Go on forward.
 33283                                  fusX:	
 33284 00002F57 07                      	pop	es
 33285 00002F58 58                      	pop	ax
 33286 00002F59 C3                      	retn
 33287                                  
 33288                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33289                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 33290                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33291                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 33292                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 33293                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33294                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33295                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33296                                  
 33297                                  isHideMCB:
 33298                                  	;push	ax
 33299                                  
 33300 00002F5A 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 33301 00002F60 7522                    	jne	short ihm_x			     ; then check for HIDDEN
 33302                                  
 33303                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 33304                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 33305 00002F62 26813E08004849          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 33306 00002F69 7519                    	jne	short ihm_x
 33307                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 33308                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 33309 00002F6B 26813E0A004444          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 33310 00002F72 7510                    	jne	short ihm_x
 33311                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 33312                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 33313 00002F74 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 33314 00002F7B 7507                    	jne	short ihm_x
 33315                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 33316                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 33317 00002F7D 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 33318                                  ihm_x:	
 33319                                  	;pop	ax
 33320 00002F84 C3                      	retn
 33321

 33332 00002F85 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 33333 00002F8C B82020                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; mov ax,2020h ; 31/12/2022
 33334 00002F8F 26A30800                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 33335 00002F93 26A30A00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 33336 00002F97 26A30C00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 33337 00002F9B 26A30E00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 33338 00002F9F C3                      	retn

 33340                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33341                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 33342                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 33344                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 33345                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 33346                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX

 33351                                  
 33352                                  	;push	si ; ?

 33355                                  	;push	bx ; *
 33356                                  
 33357                                  	; 09/04/2019
 33358                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 33359                                  
 33360 00002FA0 B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 33361 00002FA2 CD21                    	int	21h
 33362                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 33363                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists

 33366 00002FA8 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh

 33368                                  
 33369                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 33370                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 33371                                  xhu_e:	
 33372                                  	;stc
 33373 00002FAB F5                      	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *

 33396

 33409                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 33410                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33411                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33412                                  
 33413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33414                                  ;
 33415                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33416                                  ;
 33417                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33418                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33419                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33420                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33421                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33422                                  ;
 33423                                  ;	Output : none
 33424                                  ;
 33425                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33426                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33427                                  ;
 33428                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33429                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33430                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33431                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33432                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33433                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33434                                  
 33435                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33436                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33437                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33438                                  InitDevLoad:
 33439                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33440                                  	;push	es ; *
 33441                                  
 33442                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33443                                  	; ds = cs
 33444 00002FBF 803E[581F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33445                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33446                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33447 00002FC4 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33448                                  
 33449                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33450                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33451                                  ; %if 0
 33452                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33453 00002FC6 803E[481F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1
 33454                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33455 00002FCB 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33456                                  
 33457                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33458                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33459                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33460                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33461                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33462                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33463                                  
 33464 00002FCD E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33465                                  
 33466 00002FD0 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33467 00002FD3 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33468 00002FD6 E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33469 00002FD9 9C                      	pushf
 33470 00002FDA E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33471 00002FDD 9D                      	popf
 33472                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33473                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33474                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33475 00002FDE EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33476                                  
 33477                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33478                                  
 33479                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33480                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33481                                  InitForConv:
 33482                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33483                                  	; ds = cs
 33484 00002FE0 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33485                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33486 00002FE3 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33487 00002FE5 E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33488 00002FE8 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33489                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33490 00002FEB 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33491                                  					;  in low memory
 33492                                  InitForHi:
 33493                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33494                                  	; ds = cs
 33495                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33496                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33497                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33498 00002FED A1[4E1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33499 00002FF0 8B16[4A1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33500 00002FF4 0316[4C1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33501 00002FF8 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33502                                  
 33503                                  InitForLo:
 33504                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33505                                  	; ds = cs
 33506                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33507 00002FFA C606[581F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33508                                  initforlo_x:
 33509                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33510                                  	; ds = cs
 33511                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33512                                  					;  we are loading low
 33513                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = Start of Low memory
 33514                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33515 00002FFF A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33516 00003002 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33517                                  idl1:
 33518 00003006 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33519                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33520                                  	; ds = cs
 33521                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33522                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33523                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33524                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33525 00003009 A3[3C1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33526 0000300C 8916[3E1F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33527 00003010 C706[401F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33528 00003016 A3[421F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33529                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33530                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33531 00003019 C3                      	retn
 33532                                  
 33533                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33534                                  ;
 33535                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33536                                  ;
 33537                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33538                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33539                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33540                                  ;		   current UMB
 33541                                  ;
 33542                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33543                                  
 33544                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33545                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33546                                  	; ds = cs
 33547                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33548                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33549                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33550 0000301A A1[4C1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33551 0000301D 0306[4A1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33552 00003021 2B06[4E1F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33553                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33554                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33555                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33556                                  	;stc
 33557                                  	;retn
 33558                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33559 00003025 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33560 00003028 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33561                                  spcinumb1:
 33562 0000302A 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 33563                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33564                                  	; ds = cs
 33565 0000302B 3B06[3A1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 33566                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 33567                                  spcinumb2:
 33568 0000302F C3                      	retn
 33569                                  
 33570                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33571                                  ;
 33572                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 33573                                  ;
 33574                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33575                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33576                                  ;
 33577                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33578                                  
 33579                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33580                                  ;
 33581                                  ;PrepareMark:
 33582                                  ;	push	ds
 33583                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 33584                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33585                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33586                                  ;	pop	ds
 33587                                  ;
 33588                                  ;	inc	ax
 33589                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33590                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33591                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33592                                  ;	retn
 33593                                  
 33594                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33595                                  ;
 33596                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33597                                  ;
 33598                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33599                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33600                                  ;		 the device.
 33601                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33602                                  ;
 33603                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33604                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33605                                  ;	UMB.
 33606                                  ;
 33607                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33608                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33609                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33610                                  ;
 33611                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33612                                  
 33613                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33614                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33615                                  
 33616                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33617                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33618                                  	; ds = cs
 33619 00003030 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33620 00003033 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33621 00003036 CD21                    	int	21h
 33622                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33623                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33624                                  
 33625 00003038 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33626                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33627                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33628 0000303A 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33629                                  
 33630 0000303C 4B                      	dec	bx
 33631                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33632                                  	; ds = cs
 33633 0000303D 391E[3A1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33634                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33635 00003041 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33636                                  
 33637 00003043 43                      	inc	bx
 33638                                  
 33639 00003044 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33640 00003047 CD21                    	int	21h
 33641 00003049 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33642                                  
 33643                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33644                                  	;dec	ax
 33645                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33646                                  	;
 33647                                  PrepareMark:
 33648 0000304B 1E                      	push	ds
 33649 0000304C 48                      	dec	ax
 33650 0000304D 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33651 0000304F C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33652 00003055 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33653 0000305B 40                      	inc	ax
 33654 0000305C 1F                      	pop	ds
 33655                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33656                                  	; ds = cs
 33657                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33658                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33659                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33660                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 33661 0000305D 891E[4C1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 33662 00003061 A3[4A1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33663 00003064 A3[4E1F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33664                                  	;
 33665                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33666                                  	; cf=0
 33667                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33668 00003067 C3                      	retn
 33669                                  
 33670                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33671                                  %if 1
 33672                                  gufd_err:
 33673 00003068 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33674                                  gufd_error:
 33675 0000306A 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33676 0000306C F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33677 0000306D EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33678                                  %endif
 33679                                  
 33680                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33681                                  %if 0
 33682                                  gufd_err:
 33683                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33684                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33685                                  	; ds = cs
 33686                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33687                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33688                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33689                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33690                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33691                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33692                                  	stc
 33693                                  	retn
 33694                                  %endif
 33695                                  
 33696                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33697                                  ;
 33698                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33699                                  ;
 33700                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33701                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33702                                  ;
 33703                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33704                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33705                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33706                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33707                                  ;
 33708                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33709                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33710                                  ;
 33711                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33712                                  
 33713                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33714                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 33715                                  
 33716                                  DevSetMark:
 33717 0000306F 06                      	push	es
 33718                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33719                                  	;push	di
 33720 00003070 1E                      	push	ds
 33721 00003071 56                      	push	si
 33722 00003072 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 34230                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34231                                  ;
 34232                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34233                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34234                                  ;
 34235                                  ;	Returns in AX the number of paras equivalent to the
 34236                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34237                                  ;
 34238                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34239                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34240                                  ;
 34241                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34242                                  
 34243                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34244                                  
 34245                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34246                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34247
