 34351                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34352                                  ;
 34353                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34354                                  ;
 34355                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34356                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34357                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34358                                  ;			; DS = data
 34359                                  ;
 34360                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34361                                  ;
 34362                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34363                                  ;
 34364                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34365                                  
 34366                                  umb_insert:
 34367 00003253 1E                      	push	ds
 34368                                  
 34369                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34370                                  	; ds = cs
 34371                                  
 34372                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34373 00003254 8E1E[671F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34374                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34375 00003258 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34376 0000325C 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34377 0000325E 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34378                                  ui_next:
 34379 00003260 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34380                                  					;    new block
 34381 00003262 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34382                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34383                                  					;    last
 34384 00003264 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34385 0000326A 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34386                                  					; N: get next block
 34387 0000326C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34388                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34389 0000326E E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34390 00003271 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34391                                  
 34392                                  ui_insert:
 34393 00003273 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34394 00003275 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34395                                  
 34396 00003276 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34397 00003278 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34398                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34399 0000327A C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34400                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34401 0000327F C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34402                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34403 00003285 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34404                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34405 00003289 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34406                                  
 34407                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34408                                  
 34409 0000328F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34410 00003291 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34411 00003297 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34412                                  					; mark as free
 34413 0000329E 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34414                                  					; start & end of new block
 34415 000032A1 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34416                                  
 34417                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34418                                  	
 34419 000032A6 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34420 000032A8 43                      	inc	bx
 34421 000032A9 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34422 000032AB 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34423                                  
 34424                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34425                                  					; this block
 34426 000032AC 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34427                                  	
 34428 000032AE 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34429 000032B4 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34430 000032BB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34431 000032BF 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34432                                  
 34433 000032C6 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34434                                  
 34435                                  ui_append:
 34436                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34437 000032C8 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34438 000032CD 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34439                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34440                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34441                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34442 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34443                                  
 34444 000032D9 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34445 000032DB 40                      	inc	ax
 34446 000032DC 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34447                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34448 000032DE F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34449                                  
 34450 000032E0 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34451                                  
 34452 000032E2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34453 000032E8 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34454 000032EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34455 000032F3 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34456                                  
 34457                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34458 000032FA 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34459 000032FC 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34460 00003302 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34461                                  					; mark as free
 34462 00003309 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34463 0000330A 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34464                                  ui_done:
 34465                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34466 0000330F 1F                      	pop	ds
 34467                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34468                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34469                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34470 00003310 C3                      	retn

 34501                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34502                                  
 34503                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34504                                  
 34505                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34506                                  ;
 34507                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34508                                  ;
 34509                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34510                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34511                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34512                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34513                                  ;
 34514                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34515                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34516                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34517                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34518                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34519                                  ;
 34520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34521                                  
 34522                                  umb_coalesce:
 34523                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34524                                  	; ds = cs
 34525 00003320 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34526                                  
 34527 00003321 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34528                                  
 34529                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34530                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34531 00003323 8E06[671F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34532 00003327 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34533                                  uc_nextfree:
 34534 0000332C 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34535 0000332E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34536                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34537 00003330 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34538 00003335 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34539                                  					; N: get next arena
 34540 00003337 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34541 0000333A 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34542 0000333C EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34543                                  uc_again:
 34544 0000333E E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34545 00003341 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34546                                  uc_check:
 34547 00003343 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34548 00003348 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34549                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34550 0000334A 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34551 0000334F 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34552                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34553 00003350 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34554 00003354 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34555 00003357 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34556 00003359 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34557                                  
 34558                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34559                                  ;uc_done:
 34560                                  	;retn

 34610                                  ;
 34611                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34612                                  ;
 34613                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34614                                  ;
 34615                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34616                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34617                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34618                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34619                                  ;				NC
 34620                                  ;			  else 
 34621                                  ;				CY
 34622                                  ;

 34624                                  ;

 34633                                  					;   possible
 34634                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34636                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34637                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34638                                  					; the largest UMB
 34639 00003393 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34640 00003395 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34641

 34652                                  ua_err:
 34653 000033A2 F9                      	stc	
 34654                                  
 34655                                  	;clc
 34656                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34657                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34658                                  	; cf=0
 34659                                  	;clc 
 34660                                  ua_done:
 34661 000033A3 58                      	pop	ax
 34662 000033A4 C3                      	retn

 34664                                  ;ua_err:

 34669                                  ;
 34670                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 34671                                  ;

 34673                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 34674                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged

 34679                                  get_next:

 34682                                  _get_next_:

 34684 000033AE 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 34685 000033B2 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 34686 000033B3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax

 34689                                  	; 11/12/2022

 34701                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34702                                  ;

 34704

 34715

 34718

 34720 000033BF B106                    	mov	cl,6

 34722

 34724 000033C5 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34725

 34735

 34737 000033DD 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34738

 34743 000033EC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34744                                  					; mark as free 
 34745 000033F3 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34746 000033F4 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34747                                  
 34748                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34749                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34750 000033F9 8E06[671F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 34751                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34752 000033FD 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 34753                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 34754                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34755                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34756                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 34757                                  
 34758                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 34759                                  
 34760                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 34761                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 34762                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34763 00003402 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34764 00003407 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34765                                  ;scan_next
 34766                                  ; 09/12/2022
 34767                                  scannext:
 34768 00003409 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34769 0000340D 740C                    	je	short got_last
 34770                                  	
 34771 0000340F 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34772 00003411 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34773 00003416 40                      	inc	ax
 34774 00003417 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34775                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34776                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34777 00003419 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34778                                  got_last:
 34779                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34780                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34781 0000341B 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34782                                  
 34783 00003420 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34784                                  	;clc

 34786                                  	; 11/12/2022

 34788                                  	;clc
 34789 00003426 C3                      	retn

 34797                                  ;	;stc

 34802                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34803                                  ;
 34804                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34805                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34806                                  ;
 34807                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34808                                  
 34809                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34810                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34811                                  	; ds = cs
 34812 00003427 833E[4A1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 34813                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 34814 0000342C 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 34815 0000342E 06                      	push	es
 34816                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34817                                  	;push	bx
 34818                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34819                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 34820                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34821                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 34822 0000342F 8B1E[4E1F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 34823 00003433 2B1E[4A1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34824 00003437 8E06[4A1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34825                                  	
 34826 0000343B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34827 0000343E CD21                    	int	21h
 34828                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34829                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34830                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 34831 00003440 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34832 00003442 48                      	dec	ax
 34833 00003443 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34834 00003445 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34835                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34836                                  	;pop	bx
 34837 0000344C 07                      	pop	es
 34838                                  su_exit:
 34839 0000344D C3                      	retn

 34856                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 34857 00003455 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 34858                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34859 00003457 8E06[671F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34860                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34861 0000345B 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34862 00003460 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34863                                  ulu_next:
 34864 00003465 E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 34865 00003468 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 34866 0000346A 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 34867 0000346C 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 34868 0000346E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34869 00003470 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next

 34873                                  ulu_x:

 34878                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34879                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34880                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34881                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34882                                  
 34883                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34884                                  ;
 34885                                  ; Summary:
 34886                                  ;
 34887                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34888                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34889                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34890                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34891                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34892                                  ;
 34893                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34894                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34895                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34896                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34897                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34898                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34899                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34900                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34901                                  ;
 34902                                  ; Example:
 34903                                  ;
 34904                                  ;   [menu]
 34905                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34906                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34907                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34908                                  ;
 34909                                  ;   [network]
 34910                                  ;   include misc
 34911                                  ;   device=foo
 34912                                  ;
 34913                                  ;   [misc]
 34914                                  ;   device=bar
 34915                                  ;   include alternate
 34916                                  ;
 34917                                  ;   [alternate]
 34918                                  ;   device=tar
 34919                                  ;
 34920                                  ;
 34921                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34922                                  ;
 34923                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34924                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34925                                  ;
 34926                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34927                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34928                                  ;   following order:
 34929                                  ;
 34930                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34931                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34932                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34933                                  ;
 34934                                  
 34935                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34936                                  
 34937                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34938                                  
 34939                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34940                                  
 34941                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34942                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34943                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34944                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34945                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34946                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34947                                  
 34948                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34949                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34950                                  
 34951                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34952                                  
 34953                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34954                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34955                                  
 34956 0000347A 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 34998 0000349B 8A0E[3649]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 34999                                  ;

 35006                                  ;

 35092                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35093                                  ;
 35094                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35095                                  ;
 35096                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35097                                  ;
 35098                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35099                                  
 35100                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35101                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35102                                  
 35103                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35104                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35105                                  parseline:
 35106                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35107                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35108                                  
 35109                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35110                                  
 35111                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35112                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35113                                  
 35114                                  nextswtch:
 35115                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35116                                  	je	short done_line
 35117                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35118                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35119                                  
 35120                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35121                                  
 35122                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35123                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35124                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35125                                  	je	short getparm
 35126                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35127                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35128                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35129                                  swterr:
 35130                                  	retn
 35131                                  
 35132                                  getparm:
 35133                                  	call	check_switch
 35134                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35135                                  	jc	short swterr
 35136                                  getnext:
 35137                                  	call	getchr
 35138                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35139                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35140                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35141                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 35142                                  ;swterr:
 35143                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35144                                  
 35145                                  done_line:
 35146                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35147                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35148                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35149                                  	jnz	short okay
 35150                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35151                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35152                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35153                                  	retn
 35154                                  
 35155                                  okay:
 35156                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 35157                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 35158                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 35159                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 35160                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 35161                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35162                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35163                                  	; cf=0
 35164                                  	;clc
 35165                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 35166                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35167                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 35168                                  ;exitpl:
 35169                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35170                                  	; ds = cs
 35171                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35172                                  	retn
 35173                                  put_back:
 35174                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 35175                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35176                                  	jmp	short done_line
 35177                                  
 35178                                  %endif
 35179                                  
 35180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35181                                  ;
 35182                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35183                                  ;
 35184                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35185                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35186                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35187                                  ; error.
 35188                                  ;
 35189                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35190                                  
 35191                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35192                                  
 35193                                  err_swtch:
 35194 000034DC 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35195                                  err_check:
 35196 000034DE F9                      	stc
 35197                                  err_chk:
 35198                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35199 000034DF C3                      	retn
 35200                                  
 35201                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35202                                  
 35203                                  check_switch:
 35204 000034E0 E8240D                  	call	getchr
 35205                                  	;jc	short err_check
 35206 000034E3 72FA                    	jc	short err_chk
 35207 000034E5 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 35208 000034E7 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 35209                                  	;jb	short err_check
 35210 000034E9 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35211 000034EB 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 35212 000034ED 77EF                    	ja	short err_check
 35213                                  
 35214 000034EF 06                      	push	es
 35215                                  
 35216 000034F0 0E                      	push	cs
 35217 000034F1 07                      	pop	es
 35218                                  
 35219                                  	;mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 35220                                  	;mov	ch,0
 35221                                  	;mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 35222                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35223 000034F2 BF[CA49]                	mov	di,switchlist
 35224 000034F5 8A0D                    	mov	cl,[di]
 35225 000034F7 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 35226 000034F9 47                      	inc	di	; 1+switchlist
 35227                                  
 35228 000034FA F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 35229                                  
 35230 000034FC 07                      	pop	es
 35231 000034FD 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check
 35232                                  
 35233 000034FF B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 35234 00003502 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 35235 00003504 8B1E[3749]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 35236 00003508 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 35237 0000350A 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 35238                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35239 0000350C A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 35240                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 35241 0000350E 74CF                    	jz	short done_swtch
 35242                                  
 35243 00003510 E8F40C                  	call	getchr
 35244 00003513 72C7                    	jc	short err_swtch
 35245                                  
 35246 00003515 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 35247 00003517 75C3                    	jne	short err_swtch
 35248                                  
 35249 00003519 E8EB0C                  	call	getchr
 35250 0000351C 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 35251                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35252                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 35253                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35254                                  	; ds = cs
 35255 0000351D C606[AE02]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 35256 00003522 E8980D                  	call	getnum
 35257                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35258                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35259 00003525 C606[AE02]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 35260 0000352A 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 35261                                  
 35262                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 35263                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 35264                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 35265

 35280                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35281                                  ;
 35282                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35283                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35284                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35285                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35286                                  ;
 35287                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35288                                  
 35289                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35290                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35291                                  process_num:

 35293 0000352F 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35294                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35295 00003531 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35296                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35297 00003534 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35298 00003536 A2[3649]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35299                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35300                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35301                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35302                                  	; cf=0
 35303 00003539 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35304                                  try_f:
 35305                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35306 0000353A F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 35307                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35308 0000353D 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35309                                  
 35310                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35311                                  
 35312                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 35313 0000353F A2[0F48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35314                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35315                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35316                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35317                                  	; cf=0
 35318 00003542 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35319                                  try_t:
 35320 00003543 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 35321 00003545 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35322                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35323 00003547 F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 35324                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 35325 0000354A 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 35326                                  
 35327                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 35328 0000354C A3[1248]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 35329                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35330                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35331                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35332                                  	; cf=0
 35333 0000354F C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35334                                  try_s:
 35335                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35336 00003550 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 35337                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 35338 00003553 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 35339 00003555 A3[3449]                	mov	[slim],ax
 35340                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35341                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35342                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35343                                  	; cf=0
 35344 00003558 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35345                                  
 35346                                  ; must be for number of heads
 35347

 35349 00003559 A3[3249]                	mov	[hlim],ax
 35350                                  done_ret:

 35352                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35353                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35354                                  	; cf=0 (test instruction resets cf)
 35355                                  	;clc
 35356 0000355C C3                      	retn

 35366                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35367                                  ;
 35368                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35369                                  ;
 35370                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35371                                  
 35372                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35373                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35374                                  
 35375                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35376                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)

 35378                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35379                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35380                                  
 35381                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35382                                  
 35383                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35384                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35385                                  
 35386                                  nextswtch:
 35387 0000355D 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35388 0000355F 741C                    	je	short done_line
 35389 00003561 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35390 00003563 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35391                                  
 35392                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35393                                  
 35394 00003565 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?

 35396 00003569 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 35397 0000356B 7402                    	je	short getparm
 35398 0000356D F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35399                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35400                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35401                                  swterr:
 35402 0000356E C3                      	retn
 35403                                  
 35404                                  getparm:

 35406 00003572 891E[3749]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35407 00003576 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 35408                                  getnext:
 35409 00003578 E88C0C                  	call	getchr
 35410                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35411                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35412                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35413 0000357B 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 35414                                  ;swterr:
 35415                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35416                                  
 35417                                  done_line:

 35420                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified

 35423                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35424                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35425 00003585 C3                      	retn
 35426                                  
 35427                                  ;exitpl:
 35428                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35429                                  	; ds = cs
 35430                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 35431                                  	;retn
 35432                                  
 35433                                  put_back:

 35435 0000358A FF0E[5A03]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35436 0000358E EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 35437

 35442 00003599 C706[3448]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0

 35457                                  ;
 35458                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35459                                  ;
 35460                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35461                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35462                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35463                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35464                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35465                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35466                                  ;
 35467                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35468                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35469                                  ;
 35470                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35471                                  ;
 35472                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35473                                  
 35474                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35475                                  
 35476                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35477                                  
 35478                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35479                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35480                                  
 35481                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35482                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35483                                  
 35484                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35485                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35486                                  	; ds = cs
 35487                                  
 35488 0000359F 06                      	push	es
 35489                                  
 35490 000035A0 0E                      	push	cs
 35491 000035A1 07                      	pop	es
 35492                                  
 35493 000035A2 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35494 000035A4 8A1E[0F48]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 35495 000035A8 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35496 000035AB 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 35497                                  
 35498 000035AD C706[1248]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35499                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35500                                  got_80:
 35501 000035B3 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 35502 000035B5 8BB7[B649]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 35503                                  
 35504                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 35505                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35506 000035B9 BF[1548]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 35507 000035BC B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 35508                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35509                                  	;mov	cx,59 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM A_BPB.size
 35510 000035BF FC                      	cld
 35511                                  	;repe	movsb
 35512                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35513 000035C0 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 35514                                  
 35515 000035C2 07                      	pop	es
 35516                                  
 35517                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35518 000035C3 F606[3749]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35519                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35520 000035C8 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 35521                                  
 35522 000035CA A1[3449]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 35523                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 35524 000035CD A3[2248]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 35525                                  
 35526                                  see_heads:
 35527                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35528 000035D0 F606[3749]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35529                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35530 000035D5 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 35531                                  
 35532 000035D7 A1[3249]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 35533                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 35534 000035DA A3[2448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 35535                                  
 35536                                  heads_not_altered:
 35537                                  
 35538                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 35539                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 35540                                  
 35541                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 35542                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35543                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 35544                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35545 000035DD B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 35546 000035E0 A2[1748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 35547                                  
 35548 000035E3 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 35549                                  
 35550                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 35551                                  
 35552                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 35553                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35554 000035E5 8A3E[1F48]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 35555                                  	
 35556                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35557                                  	; ax = 2
 35558 000035E9 3906[2448]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 35559                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 35560 000035ED 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediaid ; just use default if heads>2
 35561                                  
 35562 000035EF 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 35563                                  
 35564                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35565                                  
 35566 000035F1 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35567                                  
 35568                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35569                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35570                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35571                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35572                                  
 35573                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35574                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35575                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35576                                  
 35577 000035F3 833E[2248]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35578 000035F8 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35579 000035FA 833E[1248]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35580 000035FF 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35581                                  
 35582                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35583                                  
 35584 00003601 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35585                                  
 35586                                  ;	check for 320K
 35587                                  
 35588                                  not_144m:
 35589 00003603 833E[1248]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35590 00003608 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35591 0000360A 833E[2248]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35592 0000360F 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediaid
 35593                                  
 35594 00003611 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 35595 00003613 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediaid
 35596                                  
 35597                                  only_one_head:
 35598                                  
 35599                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35600                                  
 35601 00003615 803E[0F48]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35602 0000361A 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35603                                  
 35604                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 35605                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 35606                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 35607                                  
 35608 0000361C B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 35609 0000361E 833E[2248]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35610                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35611 00003623 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 35612                                  
 35613 00003625 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 35614                                  
 35615                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 35616                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 35617                                  
 35618                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 35619                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35620                                  	; ax = 2
 35621 00003627 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 35622 00003628 A2[1748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 35623                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 35624                                  
 35625                                  got_correct_mediaid:
 35626 0000362B 881E[1F48]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 35627                                  
 35628                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 35629                                  
 35630 0000362F A1[1248]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 35631 00003632 F726[2448]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 35632 00003636 F726[2248]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35633 0000363A A3[1D48]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 35634 0000363D F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 35635                                  
 35636 0000363E C3                      	retn
 35637                                  
 35638                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine

 36182                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36183                                  ;
 36184                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36185                                  ;
 36186                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36187                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36188                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36189                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36190                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36191                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36192                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36193                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36194                                  ;
 36195                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36196                                  
 36197                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36198                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 36199                                  
 36200                                  skip_comment:
 36201 00003847 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 36202                                  
 36203                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36204                                  	; ds = cs	
 36205                                  
 36206 00003849 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 36207                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 36208 0000384E 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 36209                                  
 36210 00003850 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 36211                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 36212 00003855 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 36213                                  
 36214 00003857 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36215                                  	
 36216 0000385A 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 36217                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 36218 0000385E 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 36219                                  
 36220 00003860 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 36221                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 36222 00003865 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36223                                  
 36224 00003867 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36225                                  	
 36226 0000386B 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36227                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36228 0000386F 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36229                                  skip_cmmt:
 36230 00003871 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36231 00003873 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36232 00003876 46                      	inc	si
 36233 00003877 49                      	dec	cx
 36234 00003878 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36235 0000387A 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36236                                  no_commt:
 36237 0000387C C3                      	retn

 36239                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36240                                  ; (SYSINIT:42C8h)
 36241                                  
 36242                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36243                                  ;%if 0

 36247                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36248                                  ;
 36249                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36250                                  ;
 36251                                  ;   INPUT
 36252                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36253                                  ;
 36254                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36255                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36256                                  ;
 36257                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36258                                  ;       All
 36259                                  ;
 36260                                  ;   HISTORY
 36261                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36262                                  ;
 36263                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36264                                  
 36265                                  kbd_read:
 36266 0000387D F606[DA46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36267 00003882 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36268                                  
 36269 00003884 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36270 00003885 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36271 00003887 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36272                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36273                                  kbd_loop:
 36274 00003889 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36275 0000388B CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36276 0000388D 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36277 0000388F B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36278 00003891 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36279 00003893 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36280 00003895 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36281 00003897 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36282                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36283                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36284 0000389A 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36285                                  
 36286 0000389F 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36287 000038A1 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36288                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36289 000038A3 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36290                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36291 000038A4 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36292 000038A6 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36293 000038A8 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36294 000038AA A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36295 000038AC 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36296 000038AE 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36297 000038AF 43                              inc     bx
 36298                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36299 000038B0 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36300                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36301 000038B5 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36302 000038B7 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36303 000038B9 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36304 000038BB 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36305 000038BD 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36306                                  
 36307                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36308 000038BF 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36309 000038C2 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36310                                  	
 36311 000038C4 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36312 000038C7 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36313                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36314 000038C9 BA[714B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36315 000038CC E8DD0B                          call    print
 36316                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36317 000038CF 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36318 000038D4 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36319                                  kbd_notf5:
 36320                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36321 000038D6 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36322 000038D9 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36323                                  
 36324 000038DB 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36325 000038DE 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36326                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36327 000038E0 BA[AF4B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36328 000038E3 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36329 000038E6 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36330 000038E8 881E[DE46]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36331                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36332 000038EC B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36333 000038EE CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36334 000038F0 C606[E446]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36335 000038F5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36336 000038F7 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36337                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36338 000038F9 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36339 000038FC 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36340                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36341 000038FE E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36342 00003901 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36343 00003902 C3                              retn			;
 36344                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36345 00003903 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36346 00003904 C3                              retn			;
 36347                                  
 36348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36349                                  ;
 36350                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36351                                  ;
 36352                                  ;   INPUT
 36353                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36354                                  ;
 36355                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36356                                  ;       None
 36357                                  ;
 36358                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36359                                  ;       None
 36360                                  ;
 36361                                  ;   HISTORY
 36362                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36363                                  ;
 36364                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36365                                  
 36366                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36367                                  
 36368                                  set_numlock:
 36369                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36370                                  	;push	ax
 36371 00003905 1E                              push    ds
 36372 00003906 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36373 00003908 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36374 0000390A 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36375 0000390D 2E3B06[4C4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36376 00003912 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36377 00003914 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36378 00003919 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36379                                  not_off:
 36380 0000391B 2E3B06[4A4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36381 00003920 F9                              stc
 36382 00003921 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36383 00003923 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36384                                  set_done:
 36385 00003928 1F                              pop     ds
 36386                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36387                                  	;pop	ax
 36388 00003929 C3                              retn
 36389                                  
 36390                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36391                                  
 36392                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36393                                  ;
 36394                                  ;   menu_check: check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36395                                  ;
 36396                                  ;   INPUT
 36397                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36398                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36399                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36400                                  ;
 36401                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36402                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36403                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36404                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36405                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36406                                  ;
 36407                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36408                                  ;       All
 36409                                  ;
 36410                                  ;   NOTES
 36411                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36412                                  ;
 36413                                  ;   HISTORY
 36414                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36415                                  ;
 36416                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36417                                  
 36418                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36419                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36420                                  
 36421                                  menu_check:
 36422                                  
 36423                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36424                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36425                                  
 36426 0000392A 51                              push    cx              ;
 36427 0000392B 56                              push    si              ;
 36428 0000392C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36429                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36430 0000392E E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36431 00003931 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36432 00003933 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36433 00003935 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 36434 00003937 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 36435 00003938 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36436                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 36437 0000393A 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36438 0000393C 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 36439 0000393E 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 36440 00003940 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 36441 00003942 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 36442 00003945 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 36443 0000394A EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36444                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 36445 0000394C 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 36446 0000394E 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 36447                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 36448 00003950 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 36449                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 36450 00003953 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 36451 00003955 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 36452 00003957 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 36453 00003959 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 36454 0000395B E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 36455 0000395E 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 36456 00003960 3A06[961E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 36457 00003964 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 36458 00003966 800E[DA46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36459 0000396B EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
