 36460                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 36461 0000396D 3A06[A21E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 36462 00003971 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 36463 00003973 800E[DA46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 36464 00003978 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36465                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 36466 0000397A E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36467 0000397D EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 36468                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 36469 0000397F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36470 00003980 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36471                                  
 36472                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 36473                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 36474                                  
 36475 00003981 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36476 00003986 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 36477                                  ;
 36478                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 36479                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 36480                                  ;
 36481 00003988 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 36482 0000398B 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 36483 0000398D E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 36484                                  
 36485                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 36486                                  
 36487                                  menu_search:
 36488 00003990 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 36489 00003992 BF[1F47]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 36490 00003995 E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 36491 00003998 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 36492 0000399A C606[1747]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 36493 0000399F E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 36494                                  
 36495                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 36496                                  
 36497                                  menu_color:
 36498 000039A2 51                      	push	cx              ;
 36499 000039A3 52                      	push	dx              ;
 36500                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 36501                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36502                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 36503 000039A4 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 36504 000039A7 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 36505 000039AA 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 36506                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 36507                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 36508                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 36509                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 36510 000039AC 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 36511 000039AE E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 36512 000039B1 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 36513 000039B3 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 36514 000039B6 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 36515 000039B9 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 36516                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36517                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 36518 000039BB B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 36519 000039BD D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 36520 000039BF 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 36521                                  check_color:
 36522 000039C1 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 36523 000039C3 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 36524 000039C5 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36525                                  set_color:
 36526 000039C8 8816[D546]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 36527 000039CC 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 36528 000039CD 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 36529 000039CE E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 36530                                  
 36531                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 36532                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 36533                                  
 36534                                  menu_found:
 36535 000039D1 C606[DF46]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 36536                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 36537 000039D6 C606[E346]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36538 000039DB 8026[DE46]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 36539                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36540 000039E0 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 36541 000039E2 8916[E146]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 36542                                  
 36543 000039E6 E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 36544                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36545                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 36546                                  
 36547                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 36548                                  
 36549                                  menu_process:
 36550 000039E9 E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36551 000039EC 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 36552 000039EE 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36553 000039F0 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 36554 000039F2 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 36555 000039F4 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36556 000039F6 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 36557 000039F8 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 36558 000039FA 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 36559 000039FC 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 36560 000039FE 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 36561 00003A00 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 36562 00003A02 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 36563 00003A04 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36564 00003A06 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 36565 00003A08 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 36566 00003A0A 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36567 00003A0C E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 36568 00003A0F 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36569 00003A11 F9                              stc                     ;
 36570 00003A12 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 36571 00003A15 EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36572                                  menu_numlock:
 36573 00003A17 E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 36574 00003A1A EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36575                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 36576 00003A1C EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 36577                                  
 36578                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 36579                                  
 36580                                  menu_default:
 36581 00003A1E 8936[E146]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 36582 00003A22 803E[E446]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 36583 00003A27 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 36584 00003A29 E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 36585 00003A2C 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 36586 00003A2E E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 36587 00003A31 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 36588 00003A33 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 36589 00003A35 E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 36590 00003A38 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 36591                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 36592 00003A3B 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 36593 00003A3D B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 36594                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 36595 00003A3F 881E[E346]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 36596                                  timeout_skip:
 36597 00003A43 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36598                                  
 36599                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 36600                                  
 36601                                  menu_item:
 36602                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 36603 00003A45 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 36604 00003A48 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 36605 00003A4A 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 36606 00003A4C E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 36607 00003A4F 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 36608 00003A51 F9                              stc                     ;
 36609 00003A52 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 36610 00003A55 EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 36611                                  
 36612                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 36613                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 36614                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 36615                                  
 36616                                  menu_itemfound:
 36617 00003A57 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 36618 00003A58 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 36619 00003A5A 8887[E546]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 36620 00003A5E 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 36621                                  
 36622                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 36623                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 36624                                  ;   description...
 36625                                  
 36626 00003A60 89B7[EF46]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 36627 00003A64 89B7[0347]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 36628 00003A68 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 36629 00003A6A E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 36630 00003A6D 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36631 00003A6F E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 36632 00003A72 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36633 00003A74 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 36634 00003A76 89BF[0347]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 36635                                  
 36636                                  menu_nextitem:
 36637 00003A7A E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36638 00003A7D E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 36639                                  
 36640                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 36641                                  
 36642                                  menu_getdefault:
 36643 00003A80 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 36644 00003A82 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 36645 00003A84 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 36646 00003A86 E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 36647                                  menu_valid:
 36648 00003A89 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 36649 00003A8B 8816[E046]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 36650 00003A8F 8B3E[E146]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 36651 00003A93 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 36652 00003A95 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 36653 00003A97 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 36654                                  menu_chkdefault:
 36655 00003A98 53                              push    bx              ;
 36656 00003A99 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36657 00003A9B 8BB7[EF46]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36658 00003A9F B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 36659 00003AA2 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36660 00003AA3 06                              push    es              ;
 36661 00003AA4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36662 00003AA5 E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 36663 00003AA8 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36664 00003AA9 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36665 00003AAA 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 36666 00003AAC 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36667 00003AAD 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 36668 00003AB1 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 36669                                  menu_nodefault:
 36670 00003AB3 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 36671                                  menu_setdefault:
 36672 00003AB5 881E[DF46]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 36673                                  
 36674                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 36675                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 36676                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 36677                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 36678                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 36679                                  ;   with no timeout)
 36680                                  
 36681 00003AB9 803E[E346]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 36682 00003ABE 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 36683 00003AC0 F606[DE46]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 36684 00003AC5 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 36685 00003AC7 E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 36686                                  
 36687                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 36688                                  
 36689                                  menu_display:
 36690 00003ACA B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 36691 00003ACC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36692 00003ACE B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 36693 00003AD0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36694 00003AD2 06                              push    es              ;
 36695 00003AD3 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 36696 00003AD6 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 36697 00003AD8 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 36698 00003ADC A3[DC46]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 36699 00003ADF 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 36700 00003AE3 A2[DB46]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 36701 00003AE6 A1[D646]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 36702 00003AE9 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36703 00003AEB B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 36704 00003AEE 8A3E[D546]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 36705 00003AF2 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 36706                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 36707 00003AF4 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 36708 00003AF9 FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 36709                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 36710 00003AFB 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 36711 00003B00 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 36712 00003B02 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 36713 00003B04 8A36[D946]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 36714                                  menu_clear:
 36715 00003B08 CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 36716 00003B0A 07                              pop     es              ;
 36717 00003B0B 8836[D946]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 36718 00003B0F BA[EC4B]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 36719 00003B12 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 36720                                  
 36721 00003B15 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36722 00003B1A 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 36723 00003B1C 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36724 00003B20 8A36[D946]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 36725 00003B24 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 36726 00003B26 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 36727 00003B28 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36728 00003B2A BA[3A4C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 36729 00003B2D E87C09                          call    print           ;
 36730 00003B30 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 36731 00003B32 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36732 00003B34 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 36733 00003B37 8816[D846]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 36734                                  
 36735                                  menu_nostatus:
 36736 00003B3B BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 36737                                  menu_disploop:
 36738 00003B3E E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 36739 00003B41 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 36740 00003B42 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 36741 00003B46 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 36742                                  
 36743                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 36744                                  
 36745 00003B48 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 36746 00003B4A 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36747 00003B4C 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 36748 00003B4F 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36749 00003B53 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 36750 00003B55 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36751                                  
 36752 00003B57 BA[274C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 36753 00003B5A E84F09                          call    print           ;
 36754 00003B5D E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 36755 00003B60 BA[F849]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 36756 00003B63 E84609                          call    print           ;
 36757 00003B66 FF36[DA46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 36758 00003B6A 800E[DA46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36759 00003B6F E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 36760 00003B72 8F06[DA46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 36761                                  
 36762                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 36763                                  
 36764                                  menu_autoselect:
 36765 00003B76 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 36766 00003B79 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 36767 00003B7B E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 36768                                  menu_abort:
 36769 00003B7E 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 36770 00003B80 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 36771                                  
 36772                                  normal_boot:
 36773 00003B83 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 36774 00003B86 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 36775 00003B88 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 36776 00003B8C 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36777 00003B8E E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 36778                                  
 36779                                  not_topmenu:
 36780 00003B91 80BF[E546]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36781 00003B96 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 36782 00003B98 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36783 00003B9A 8BBF[EF46]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36784 00003B9E E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 36785 00003BA1 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36786 00003BA3 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 36787 00003BA5 E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 36788                                  
 36789                                  not_submenu:
 36790 00003BA8 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 36791 00003BAA 8B9F[EF46]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36792                                  
 36793                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 36794                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 36795                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 36796                                  
 36797                                  no_selection:
 36798 00003BAE 891E[E146]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 36799 00003BB2 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36800 00003BB6 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36801 00003BB8 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36802 00003BB9 8E1E[9714]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36803 00003BBD 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36804                                  
 36805                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36806                                  ;
 36807                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36808                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36809                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36810                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36811                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36812                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36813                                  ;
 36814                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36815                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36816                                  
 36817                                  copyblock_loop:
 36818 00003BBF 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36819 00003BC0 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36820 00003BC3 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36821 00003BC4 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36822                                  
 36823                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36824                                  
 36825                                  copyblock_begin:
 36826                                  
 36827                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36828                                  %if 0
 36829                                          push    ax              ;
 36830                                          push    cx              ;
 36831                                          push    si              ;
 36832                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36833                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36834                                          push    ds              ;
 36835                                          push    cs              ;
 36836                                          pop     ds              ;
 36837                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36838                                          pop     ds              ;
 36839                                          pop     di              ;
 36840                                          pop     si              ;
 36841                                          pop     cx              ;
 36842                                          pop     ax              ;
 36843                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36844                                  %endif
 36845                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36846 00003BC6 57                      	push	di
 36847 00003BC7 BF[2447]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36848 00003BCA E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36849 00003BCD 5F                      	pop	di
 36850 00003BCE 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36851                                  
 36852 00003BD0 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36853 00003BD2 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36854 00003BD4 57                              push    di              ;
 36855 00003BD5 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36856 00003BD7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36857 00003BD8 06                              push    es              ;
 36858 00003BD9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36859 00003BDA E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36860 00003BDD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36861 00003BDE 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36862                                  copyblock_check:
 36863 00003BDF 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36864 00003BE1 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36865 00003BE3 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36866 00003BE6 EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36867                                  
 36868                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36869 00003BE8 E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36870 00003BEB E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36871 00003BEE 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36872 00003BF0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36873 00003BF2 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36874 00003BF4 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36875 00003BF6 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36876                                  ;
 36877                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36878                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36879                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36880                                  ;
 36881                                  move_config:
 36882 00003BF8 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36883 00003BFA 51                              push    cx              ;
 36884                                  ;
 36885                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36886                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36887                                  ;
 36888                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36889 00003BFB B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36890 00003BFE BE[1747]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36891 00003C01 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36892                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36893                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36894                                  copy_boot: 
 36895                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36896 00003C02 2E                              cs
 36897 00003C03 AC                      	lodsb
 36898 00003C04 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36899 00003C06 47                              inc     di              ;
 36900 00003C07 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36901                                  
 36902 00003C09 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36903                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36904                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36905 00003C0A B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36906 00003C0C 2E8B36[E146]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36907 00003C11 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36908 00003C13 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36909 00003C15 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36910 00003C16 07                              pop     es              ;
 36911 00003C17 BE[2447]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36912 00003C1A 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36913 00003C1D E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36914 00003C20 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36915 00003C22 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36916 00003C24 46                              inc     si              ;
 36917 00003C25 47                              inc     di              ;
 36918 00003C26 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36919 00003C28 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36920 00003C2B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36921                                  
 36922                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36923                                  
 36924 00003C2C 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36925 00003C2E 2E893E[9514]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36926 00003C33 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36927 00003C35 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36928                                  
 36929 00003C36 51                              push    cx              ;
 36930 00003C37 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36931 00003C39 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36932 00003C3A 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36933 00003C3C 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36934                                  
 36935                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36936                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36937                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36938                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36939                                  ;   is empty.
 36940                                  
 36941 00003C3D 06                              push    es              ;
 36942 00003C3E 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36943 00003C40 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36944 00003C41 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	; empty the environment block
 36945 00003C47 E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36946 00003C4A 07                              pop     es
 36947                                  
 36948                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36949                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36950                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36951                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36952                                  
 36953                                  menu_done:
 36954 00003C4B 803E[D646]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36955 00003C50 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36956 00003C52 06                              push    es              ;
 36957 00003C53 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36958 00003C56 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36959 00003C58 A1[DC46]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36960 00003C5B 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36961 00003C5F A0[DB46]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36962 00003C62 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36963 00003C66 07                              pop     es              ;
 36964                                  menu_exit:
 36965 00003C67 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36966 00003C6B 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36967                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*)
 36968                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36969                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36970                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36971 00003C6F C3                      	retn
 36972                                  
 36973                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36974                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36975                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36976                                  
 36977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36978                                  ;
 36979                                  ;   copy_envvar: copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36980                                  ;
 36981                                  ;   INPUT
 36982                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36983                                  ;
 36984                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36985                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36986                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36987                                  ;
 36988                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36989                                  ;       None
 36990                                  ;
 36991                                  ;   NOTES
 36992                                  ;       None
 36993                                  ;
 36994                                  ;   HISTORY
 36995                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36996                                  ;
 36997                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36998                                  
 36999                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37000                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 37001                                  
 37002                                  copy_envvar:
 37003 00003C70 51                              push    cx              ;
 37004 00003C71 56                              push    si              ;
 37005 00003C72 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37006 00003C73 06                              push    es              ;
 37007 00003C74 06                              push    es              ;
 37008 00003C75 8E06[9714]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 37009 00003C79 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 37010                                  
 37011                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 37012                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 37013                                  ;   config.sys line)
 37014                                  ;
 37015                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 37016                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 37017                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 37018                                  
 37019 00003C7A 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 37020                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 37021 00003C7C AC                              lodsb                   ;
 37022 00003C7D 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 37023                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37024 00003C7F 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 37025 00003C81 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 37026                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37027 00003C83 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 37028 00003C85 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 37029                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37030 00003C87 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 37031 00003C89 41                              inc     cx              ;
 37032 00003C8A 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 37033 00003C8C 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 37034 00003C8E B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 37035 00003C90 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 37036 00003C92 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 37037 00003C94 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 37038 00003C95 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 37039                                  copy_varsrch:
 37040 00003C97 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 37041 00003C9A 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 37042 00003C9C 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 37043 00003C9E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37044 00003C9F 56                              push    si              ;
 37045 00003CA0 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 37046 00003CA2 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37047 00003CA3 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37048 00003CA4 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 37049 00003CA6 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 37050 00003CAA 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 37051                                  
 37052                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 37053                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 37054                                  
 37055 00003CAC B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37056 00003CAF F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 37057 00003CB1 56                              push    si              ;
 37058 00003CB2 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37059 00003CB4 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 37060 00003CB6 2E8B0E[9514]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 37061 00003CBB 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 37062                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 37063                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 37064                                  
 37065 00003CBD F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 37066 00003CBE 26                      	es	; 26h
 37067 00003CBF A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 37068                                  
 37069 00003CC0 5E                      	pop     si
 37070                                  copy_envprep:
 37071 00003CC1 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 37072 00003CC4 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 37073 00003CC6 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 37074 00003CC9 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 37075                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 37076                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37077                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 37078 00003CCB AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 37079 00003CCC 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37080 00003CCE 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37081 00003CD0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37082 00003CD2 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37083 00003CD4 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37084 00003CD5 EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37085                                  
 37086                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37087 00003CD7 51                              push    cx              ;
 37088 00003CD8 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37089 00003CDB F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37090 00003CDD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37091 00003CDE EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37092                                  
 37093                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37094                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37095                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37096                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37097                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37098                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37099                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37100                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37101                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37102                                  
 37103                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37104 00003CE0 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37105 00003CE2 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37106                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37107 00003CE3 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37108 00003CE6 2E893E[9514]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37109                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37110 00003CEB F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37111                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37112 00003CEC F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37113 00003CED 07                              pop     es              ;
 37114 00003CEE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37115 00003CEF 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37116 00003CF0 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37117                                  
 37118                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37119 00003CF1 C3                              retn
 37120                                  
 37121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37122                                  ;
 37123                                  ;   copy_block: copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37124                                  ;
 37125                                  ;   INPUT
 37126                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37127                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37128                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37129                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37130                                  ;
 37131                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37132                                  ;       Same as above
 37133                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37134                                  ;
 37135                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37136                                  ;       All
 37137                                  ;
 37138                                  ;   NOTES
 37139                                  ;       None
 37140                                  ;
 37141                                  ;   HISTORY
 37142                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37143                                  ;
 37144                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37145                                  
 37146                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37147                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37148                                  
 37149                                  copy_block:
 37150 00003CF2 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37151 00003CF5 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37152 00003CF7 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37153 00003CF9 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37154 00003CFB 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37155                                  
 37156 00003CFD 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37157 00003CFF 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37158 00003D01 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37159                                  
 37160                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37161                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37162                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37163                                  
 37164 00003D03 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37165 00003D08 57                              push    di              ;
 37166                                  
 37167 00003D09 BF[1F47]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37168 00003D0C E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37169 00003D0F 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37170                                  
 37171 00003D11 BF[2447]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37172 00003D14 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37173 00003D17 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37174                                  
 37175 00003D19 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37176 00003D1B E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37177 00003D1E 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37178                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37179                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37180 00003D20 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37181 00003D22 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37182 00003D23 51                              push    cx              ;
 37183 00003D24 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37184 00003D26 56                              push    si              ;
 37185 00003D27 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37186 00003D28 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37187 00003D2A E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37188 00003D2D E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37189 00003D30 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37190 00003D31 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37191 00003D32 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37192 00003D34 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37193                                  
 37194                                  copy_error:
 37195                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37196 00003D36 F8                      	clc
 37197                                  copy_skip:
 37198 00003D37 5F                              pop     di
 37199                                  ;copy_error:
 37200                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37201                                  	;clc                    ;
 37202 00003D38 E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37203 00003D3B EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37204                                  
 37205                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37206                                  
 37207                                  copy_line:
 37208 00003D3D 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37209 00003D3F 47                              inc     di              ;
 37210 00003D40 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37211 00003D42 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37212 00003D44 2E803E[9A14]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37213 00003D4A 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37214 00003D4C E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37215 00003D4F 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37216 00003D51 47                              inc     di              ;
 37217 00003D52 47                              inc     di              ;
 37218 00003D53 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37219                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37220 00003D55 E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37221 00003D58 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37222 00003D5A 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37223 00003D5C 47                              inc     di              ;
 37224                                  copy_next:
 37225 00003D5D 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37226 00003D5F 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37227                                  
 37228                                  copy_nextline:
 37229 00003D61 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37230 00003D64 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37231                                  
 37232                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37233                                  ;copy_done:
 37234                                          ;retn
 37235                                  
 37236                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37237                                  ;
 37238                                  ;   get_linenum: return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37239                                  ;
 37240                                  ;   INPUT
 37241                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37242                                  ;
 37243                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37244                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37245                                  ;
 37246                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37247                                  ;       DX
 37248                                  ;
 37249                                  ;   NOTES
 37250                                  ;       None
 37251                                  ;
 37252                                  ;   HISTORY
 37253                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37254                                  ;
 37255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37256                                  
 37257                                  get_linenum:
 37258 00003D66 50                              push    ax              ;
 37259 00003D67 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37260 00003D69 51                              push    cx              ;
 37261 00003D6A 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37262 00003D6C 56                              push    si              ;
 37263 00003D6D 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37264 00003D72 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37265                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37266 00003D74 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37267 00003D77 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37268 00003D79 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37269 00003D7A 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37270 00003D7C 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37271                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37272 00003D7E 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37273 00003D7F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37274 00003D80 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37275 00003D81 C3                              retn
 37276                                  
 37277                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37278                                  ;
 37279                                  ;   srch_block: searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37280                                  ;
 37281                                  ;   INPUT
 37282                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37283                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37284                                  ;
 37285                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37286                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37287                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37288                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37289                                  ;
 37290                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37291                                  ;       None
 37292                                  ;
 37293                                  ;   NOTES
 37294                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37295                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37296                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37297                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37298                                  ;
 37299                                  ;   HISTORY
 37300                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37301                                  ;
 37302                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37303                                  
 37304                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37305 00003D82 50                              push    ax              ;
 37306 00003D83 51                              push    cx              ;
 37307 00003D84 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37308 00003D89 56                              push    si              ;
 37309 00003D8A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37310 00003D8C 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37311 00003D8D 06                              push    es              ;
 37312 00003D8E 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37313 00003D8F E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37314 00003D92 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37315 00003D94 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37316 00003D96 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37317 00003D97 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37318 00003D98 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37319 00003D99 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37320                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37321 00003D9A C3                              retn			;
 37322                                  
 37323                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37324                                  ;
 37325                                  ;   find_block: searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37326                                  ;
 37327                                  ;   INPUT
 37328                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37329                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37330                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37331                                  ;
 37332                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37333                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37334                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37335                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37336                                  ;
 37337                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37338                                  ;       AX
 37339                                  ;
 37340                                  ;   NOTES
 37341                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37342                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37343                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37344                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37345                                  ;
 37346                                  ;   HISTORY
 37347                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37348                                  ;
 37349                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37350                                  
 37351                                  find_block:
 37352 00003D9B E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37353 00003D9E 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37354 00003DA0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37355 00003DA2 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37356 00003DA4 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37357 00003DA6 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37358 00003DA8 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37359 00003DAA 2E800E[9A14]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37360 00003DB0 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37361                                  check_line:
 37362 00003DB2 2E800E[9A14]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37363 00003DB8 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37364 00003DBB 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37365                                  next_line:
 37366 00003DBD E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37367 00003DC0 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37368                                  ;find_exit:
 37369                                  ;	retn
 37370                                  
 37371                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37372                                  ;
 37373                                  ;   comp_names: compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37374                                  ;
 37375                                  ;   INPUT
 37376                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37377                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37378                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37379                                  ;
 37380                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37381                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37382                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37383                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37384                                  ;
 37385                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37386                                  ;       AX
 37387                                  ;
 37388                                  ;   NOTES
 37389                                  ;       None
 37390                                  ;
 37391                                  ;   HISTORY
 37392                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37393                                  ;
 37394                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37395                                  
 37396                                  comp_names:
 37397 00003DC2 57                              push    di              ;
 37398                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37399 00003DC3 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37400 00003DC6 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37401 00003DC8 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37402 00003DCB 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37403 00003DCD 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37404 00003DCF 47                              inc     di              ;
 37405 00003DD0 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37406                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37407 00003DD3 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37408 00003DD5 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37409 00003DD7 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37410                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37411 00003DD8 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37412 00003DD9 C3                              retn			;
 37413                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37414 00003DDA 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37415 00003DDC E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37416 00003DDF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37417 00003DE1 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37418                                  
 37419                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37420                                  
 37421                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37422                                  comp_names_x:
 37423                                  	;
 37424                                  comp_names_safe:
 37425 00003DE3 50                              push    ax
 37426 00003DE4 51                              push    cx
 37427 00003DE5 56                              push	si
 37428 00003DE6 1E                              push    ds
 37429 00003DE7 0E                              push    cs
 37430 00003DE8 1F                              pop     ds
 37431 00003DE9 E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37432 00003DEC 1F                              pop     ds
 37433 00003DED 5E                      	pop	si
 37434 00003DEE 59                              pop     cx
 37435 00003DEF 58                              pop     ax
 37436 00003DF0 C3                              retn
