 37438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37439                                  ;
 37440                                  ;   print_item: display menu item #BL
 37441                                  ;
 37442                                  ;   INPUT
 37443                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37444                                  ;
 37445                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37446                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37447                                  ;
 37448                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37449                                  ;       None
 37450                                  ;
 37451                                  ;   NOTES
 37452                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37453                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37454                                  ;
 37455                                  ;   HISTORY
 37456                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37457                                  ;
 37458                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37459                                  
 37460                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37461                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37462                                  
 37463                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37464 00003DF1 50                              push    ax              ;
 37465 00003DF2 53                              push    bx              ;
 37466 00003DF3 51                              push    cx              ;
 37467 00003DF4 52                              push    dx              ;
 37468 00003DF5 56                              push    si              ;
 37469 00003DF6 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37470 00003DF8 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37471 00003DFC CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37472 00003DFE 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37473 00003DFF B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37474 00003E01 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37475 00003E03 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37476 00003E06 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37477 00003E08 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37478 00003E0A 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37479 00003E0C 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37480 00003E0E 8A26[D546]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37481 00003E12 3A1E[DF46]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37482 00003E16 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37483 00003E18 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37484 00003E1B 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37485 00003E1D B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37486 00003E1F D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37487 00003E21 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37488 00003E23 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37489 00003E25 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37490                                  print_other:                    ;
 37491 00003E28 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37492 00003E2A 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37493 00003E2C 8BBF[0347]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37494 00003E30 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37495 00003E32 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37496 00003E36 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37497 00003E38 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37498 00003E3B CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37499 00003E3D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37500 00003E3F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37501 00003E41 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37502                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37503 00003E43 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37504 00003E46 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37505 00003E48 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37506 00003E4A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37507 00003E4C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37508                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37509 00003E4E B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37510 00003E51 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37511 00003E53 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37512 00003E55 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37513 00003E57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37514 00003E59 06                              push    es              ;
 37515                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37516 00003E5A 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37517 00003E5D 47                              inc     di              ;
 37518 00003E5E 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37519 00003E60 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37520 00003E62 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37521                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37522 00003E64 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37523 00003E66 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37524 00003E68 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37525 00003E6A 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37526 00003E6C B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37527 00003E6E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37528 00003E70 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37529 00003E72 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37530 00003E75 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37531 00003E77 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37532 00003E79 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37533 00003E7B EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37534                                  print_done:                     ;
 37535 00003E7D 07                              pop     es              ;
 37536 00003E7E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37537 00003E7F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37538 00003E81 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37539 00003E83 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37540 00003E84 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37541 00003E85 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37542 00003E86 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37543 00003E87 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37544 00003E88 C3                              retn			;
 37545                                  
 37546                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37547                                  ;
 37548                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37549                                  ;
 37550                                  ;   INPUT
 37551                                  ;       None
 37552                                  ;
 37553                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37554                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37555                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37556                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37557                                  ;
 37558                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37559                                  ;       None
 37560                                  ;
 37561                                  ;   NOTES
 37562                                  ;       None
 37563                                  ;
 37564                                  ;   HISTORY
 37565                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37566                                  ;
 37567                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37568                                  
 37569                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37570 00003E89 8A1E[DF46]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37571 00003E8D 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37572 00003E8F E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37573 00003E92 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37574 00003E95 803E[E346]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37575 00003E9A 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37576 00003E9C B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37577 00003E9E CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37578 00003EA0 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37579                                  check_time:
 37580 00003EA2 A0[E346]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37581 00003EA5 2A06[E446]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37582 00003EA9 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37583 00003EAB 800E[DE46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 37584 00003EB0 C606[E446]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37585 00003EB5 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37586                                  show_time:
 37587 00003EB8 53                              push    bx              ;
 37588 00003EB9 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37589 00003EBB 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37590 00003EBF B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37591 00003EC1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37592 00003EC3 52                              push    dx              ;
 37593 00003EC4 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37594 00003EC7 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37595 00003EC9 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37596 00003ECB BA[9A4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37597 00003ECE E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37598 00003ED1 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37599 00003ED3 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37600 00003ED4 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37601 00003ED6 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37602 00003ED8 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37603 00003EDA 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37604 00003EDC B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37605 00003EDE CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37606 00003EE0 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37607 00003EE2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37608 00003EE4 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37609 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37610 00003EE8 5A                              pop     dx
 37611 00003EE9 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37612 00003EEB CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37613 00003EED 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37614                                  input_key:
 37615 00003EEE B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37616 00003EF0 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37617 00003EF2 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37618 00003EF4 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37619 00003EF6 803E[E346]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37620 00003EFB 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37621 00003EFD B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37622 00003EFF CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37623 00003F01 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37624 00003F03 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37625 00003F05 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37626 00003F07 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37627 00003F09 B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37628                                  got_time:
 37629 00003F0B 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37630 00003F0D 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37631 00003F0F 0036[E446]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37632 00003F13 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37633                                  got_key:
 37634 00003F15 50                              push    ax              ;
 37635 00003F16 B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37636 00003F19 8706[E346]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37637 00003F1D 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37638 00003F1F 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37639 00003F21 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37640 00003F22 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37641 00003F25 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37642 00003F29 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37643 00003F2C CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37644 00003F2E 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37645                                  
 37646                                  timeout_disabled:
 37647 00003F2F 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37648 00003F30 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37649 00003F32 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37650 00003F34 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37651 00003F36 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37652                                  
 37653 00003F38 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37654 00003F3A 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37655 00003F3C 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37656 00003F3F 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37657 00003F41 FE0E[DF46]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37658 00003F45 E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37659 00003F48 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37660 00003F4A EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37661                                  not_up:
 37662 00003F4C 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37663 00003F4E 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37664 00003F50 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37665 00003F54 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37666 00003F56 FE06[DF46]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37667 00003F5A E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37668 00003F5D 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37669                                  print1: 
 37670 00003F5E 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37671                                  print2: 
 37672 00003F60 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37673 00003F63 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37674                                  to_input_key:
 37675 00003F66 EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37676                                  not_down:
 37677 00003F68 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37678 00003F6D 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37679 00003F6F 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37680 00003F71 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37681 00003F73 8036[DE46]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37682 00003F78 E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37683 00003F7B E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37684                                  not_f8:
 37685 00003F7E 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37686 00003F80 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37687                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37688                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37689                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 37690 00003F82 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 37691 00003F87 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 37692 00003F8A B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 37693 00003F8C EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 37694                                  
 37695                                  normal_key:
 37696 00003F8E 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 37697 00003F90 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 37698 00003F92 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 37699 00003F94 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 37700 00003F96 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 37701 00003F99 C3                              retn			;
 37702                                  not_backspace:
 37703 00003F9A 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 37704 00003F9C 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 37705 00003F9E 3A06[E046]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 37706 00003FA2 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 37707 00003FA4 A2[DF46]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 37708 00003FA7 E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 37709 00003FAA 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 37710 00003FAC EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 37711                                  
 37712                                  select_done:
 37713 00003FAE B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 37714 00003FB0 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37715 00003FB2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37716                                  
 37717                                  	; fall into disp_input
 37718                                  
 37719                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37720                                  
 37721                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37722                                  ;
 37723                                  ;   disp_input: display a single character + cr/lf
 37724                                  ;
 37725                                  ;   INPUT
 37726                                  ;       AL == character to display
 37727                                  ;
 37728                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37729                                  ;       None
 37730                                  ;
 37731                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37732                                  ;       None
 37733                                  ;
 37734                                  ;   NOTES
 37735                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37736                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37737                                  ;
 37738                                  ;   HISTORY
 37739                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37740                                  ;
 37741                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37742                                  
 37743                                  disp_input:
 37744 00003FB4 50                      	push	ax
 37745                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 37746                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 37747                                  	;mov	al,' '
 37748                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 37749 00003FB5 B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 37750 00003FB7 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 37751 00003FB9 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 37752                                  disp_ok:
 37753 00003FBB 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 37754                                  disp_input_ok:
 37755 00003FBD B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37756 00003FBF CD21                    	int	21h
 37757 00003FC1 BA[F849]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 37758 00003FC4 E8E504                  	call	print
 37759 00003FC7 58                      	pop	ax
 37760 00003FC8 C3                      	retn
 37761                                  
 37762                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37763                                  
 37764                                  disp_num:
 37765 00003FC9 53                              push    bx
 37766 00003FCA 0430                            add     al,'0'
 37767 00003FCC B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 37768 00003FCE 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37769 00003FD2 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 37770 00003FD5 CD10                            int     10h
 37771 00003FD7 5B                              pop     bx
 37772 00003FD8 C3                              retn
 37773                                  
 37774                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37775                                  ;
 37776                                  ;   show_status: display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 37777                                  ;
 37778                                  ;   INPUT
 37779                                  ;       None
 37780                                  ;
 37781                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37782                                  ;       None
 37783                                  ;
 37784                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37785                                  ;       None
 37786                                  ;
 37787                                  ;   NOTES
 37788                                  ;       None
 37789                                  ;
 37790                                  ;   HISTORY
 37791                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37792                                  ;
 37793                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37794                                  
 37795                                  show_status:
 37796 00003FD9 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37797 00003FDA 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37798 00003FDE B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37799 00003FE0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37800 00003FE2 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37801 00003FE3 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37802 00003FE5 8B16[D846]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 37803 00003FE9 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37804 00003FEE 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 37805 00003FF0 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 37806 00003FF2 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37807 00003FF4 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37808 00003FF7 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 37809                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37810                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 37811 00003FFA EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 37812                                  show_onoff: 
 37813 00003FFC CD10                            int     10h
 37814                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37815                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37816                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37817                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 37818                                  
 37819 00003FFE A0[964C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 37820 00004001 803E[DE46]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 37821 00004006 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 37822 00004008 A0[924C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 37823                                  show_noton:                     ;
 37824 0000400B B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 37825                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
 37826 0000400D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37827                                  ;show_done:                     ;
 37828 0000400F 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37829 00004010 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37830 00004012 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 37831 00004014 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37832 00004015 C3                              retn			;
 37833                                  
 37834                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37835                                  
 37836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37837                                  ;
 37838                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37839                                  ;
 37840                                  ;   INPUT
 37841                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37842                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37843                                  ;
 37844                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37845                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37846                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37847                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37848                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37849                                  ;
 37850                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37851                                  ;       AX
 37852                                  ;
 37853                                  ;   NOTES
 37854                                  ;       None
 37855                                  ;
 37856                                  ;   HISTORY
 37857                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37858                                  ;
 37859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37860                                  
 37861                                  skip_token:
 37862 00004016 E84D00                          call    get_char
 37863 00004019 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37864 0000401B E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37865 0000401E 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37866                                  skip_check_eol:
 37867 00004020 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37868 00004022 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37869 00004024 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37870 00004026 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37871 00004028 F8                              clc
 37872                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37873 00004029 C3                      	retn
 37874                                  skip_token_eol:
 37875 0000402A F9                              stc
 37876                                  skip_token_done:
 37877 0000402B C3                              retn
 37878                                  
 37879                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37880                                  ;
 37881                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37882                                  ;
 37883                                  ;   INPUT
 37884                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37885                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37886                                  ;
 37887                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37888                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37889                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37890                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37891                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37892                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37893                                  ;
 37894                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37895                                  ;       AX
 37896                                  ;
 37897                                  ;   NOTES
 37898                                  ;       None
 37899                                  ;
 37900                                  ;   HISTORY
 37901                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37902                                  ;
 37903                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37904                                  
 37905                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37906 0000402C E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37907 0000402F 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37908 00004032 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37909 00004034 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37910 00004037 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37911 00004039 EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37912                                  
 37913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37914                                  ;
 37915                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37916                                  ;
 37917                                  ;   INPUT
 37918                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37919                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37920                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37921                                  ;
 37922                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37923                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37924                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37925                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37926                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37927                                  ;
 37928                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37929                                  ;       AX
 37930                                  ;
 37931                                  ;   NOTES
 37932                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37933                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37934                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37935                                  ;
 37936                                  ;   HISTORY
 37937                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37938                                  ;
 37939                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37940                                  
 37941                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37942                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37943                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37944                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37945                                       
 37946                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37947                                  
 37948                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37949                                  ;
 37950                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37951                                  ;
 37952                                  ;   INPUT
 37953                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37954                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37955                                  ;
 37956                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37957                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37958                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37959                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37960                                  ;
 37961                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37962                                  ;       AX
 37963                                  ;
 37964                                  ;   NOTES
 37965                                  ;       None
 37966                                  ;
 37967                                  ;   HISTORY
 37968                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37969                                  ;
 37970                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37971                                  
 37972                                  skip_line:
 37973 0000403B E82800                          call    get_char
 37974 0000403E 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37975                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37976 00004040 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37977 00004042 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37978                                  skip_line_done:
 37979                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37980 00004044 C3                              retn
 37981                                  
 37982                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37983                                  ;
 37984                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37985                                  ;
 37986                                  ;   INPUT
 37987                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37988                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37989                                  ;
 37990                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37991                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37992                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37993                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37994                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37995                                  ;
 37996                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37997                                  ;       AX
 37998                                  ;
 37999                                  ;   NOTES
 38000                                  ;       None
 38001                                  ;
 38002                                  ;   HISTORY
 38003                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38004                                  ;
 38005                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38006                                  
 38007                                  ; 13/05/2019
 38008                                  
 38009                                  get_number:
 38010 00004045 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 38011                                  num_loop:
 38012 00004047 E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 38013 0000404A 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 38014 0000404C 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 38015 0000404E 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 38016 00004050 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 38017 00004052 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 38018 00004054 50                              push    ax              ;
 38019 00004055 B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 38020 00004058 52                              push    dx              ;
 38021 00004059 F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 38022 0000405B 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38023 0000405C 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 38024 0000405E 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38025 0000405F 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 38026 00004061 98                              cbw                     ;
 38027 00004062 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 38028 00004064 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 38029                                  
 38030                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38031                                  ;num_done:
 38032                                          ;retn
 38033                                  
 38034                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38035                                  ;
 38036                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 38037                                  ;
 38038                                  ;   INPUT
 38039                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38040                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38041                                  ;
 38042                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38043                                  ;       AL == next character
 38044                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 38045                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38046                                  ;
 38047                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38048                                  ;       AX
 38049                                  ;
 38050                                  ;   NOTES
 38051                                  ;       None
 38052                                  ;
 38053                                  ;   HISTORY
 38054                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38055                                  ;
 38056                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38057                                  
 38058                                  get_char:
 38059 00004066 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 38060 00004069 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 38061                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 38062 0000406B 26                      	es	
 38063 0000406C AC                      	lodsb
 38064 0000406D 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38065 0000406F C3                              retn			;
 38066                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38067 00004070 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38068                                  nearby_ret:
 38069 00004073 C3                              retn
 38070                                  
 38071                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38072                                  ;
 38073                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38074                                  ;
 38075                                  ;   INPUT
 38076                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38077                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38078                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38079                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38080                                  ;
 38081                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38082                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38083                                  ;
 38084                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38085                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38086                                  ;
 38087                                  ;   NOTES
 38088                                  ;       None
 38089                                  ;
 38090                                  ;   HISTORY
 38091                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38092                                  ;
 38093                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38094                                  
 38095                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38096                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38097                                  
 38098                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38099                                  query_user:
 38100 00004074 F606[DE46]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38101                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38102 00004079 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38103 0000407B E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38104                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38105                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38106                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38107                                  qu_1:
 38108 0000407E F606[DE46]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38109 00004083 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38110 00004085 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38111 00004086 A0[9914]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38112 00004089 F606[DE46]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38113 0000408E 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38114 00004090 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38115                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38116 00004092 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38117                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38118                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38119                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38120                                  
 38121                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38122 00004094 58                      	pop	ax
 38123 00004095 C3                      	retn

 38125                                  query_all:
 38126                                  
 38127                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38128                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38129                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38130                                  
 38131 00004096 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38132 00004097 BA[EC4C]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38133 0000409A 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38134 0000409C 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38135                                  
 38136 0000409E 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38137 000040A0 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38138 000040A2 BF[2B47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38139                                  find_match:                             ;
 38140 000040A5 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38141 000040A7 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38142 000040A9 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38143 000040AB 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38144 000040AC 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38145 000040AE 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38146 000040B0 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38147                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38148 000040B3 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38149                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38150 000040B5 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38151 000040B8 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38152 000040BA B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38153                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38154 000040BC 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38155 000040BE 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38156 000040BF 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38157 000040C1 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38158 000040C3 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38159 000040C5 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38160 000040C7 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38161 000040CA 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38162 000040CC B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38163                                  cmd_notset:
 38164 000040CE CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38165                                  line_print:                             ;
 38166                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38167 000040D0 26                              es
 38168 000040D1 AC                      	lodsb
 38169 000040D2 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38170 000040D4 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38171 000040D6 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38172                                  non_null:                               ;
 38173 000040D8 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38174 000040DA 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38175 000040DC 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38176                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38177 000040DE 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38178                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38179 000040E1 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38180                                  non_space:                              ;
 38181 000040E3 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38182 000040E5 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38183 000040E7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38184 000040E9 EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38185                                  
 38186                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38187 000040EB BA[8A4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38188                                  
 38189                                  generic_prompt:
 38190 000040EE E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38191                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38192 000040F1 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38193 000040F3 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38194 000040F5 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38195 000040F7 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38196 000040F9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38197 000040FC 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38198 000040FE A0[964C]                        mov     al,[_$NO] 		;
 38199 00004101 800E[DE46]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38200 00004106 EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38201                                  not_func:
 38202 00004108 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38203 0000410A 3A06[964C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38204 0000410E 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38205 00004110 3A06[924C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38206 00004114 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38207 00004116 803E[9914]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38208 0000411B 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38209 0000411D 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38210 0000411F 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38211 00004121 800E[DE46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38212 00004126 A0[924C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38213                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38214 00004129 E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38215 0000412C 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38216                                  
 38217 0000412D 3A06[964C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38218 00004131 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38219                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38220 00004133 F8                      	clc
 38221                                  do_cmd:
 38222 00004134 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38223                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38224                                  	; cf=0
 38225                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38226 00004135 C3                      	retn
 38227                                  
 38228                                  skip_cmd:
 38229 00004136 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38230                                  skip_all:
 38231 00004137 B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 38232 00004139 F9                      	stc
 38233 0000413A C3                      	retn

 38290                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38291                                  
 38292                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38293                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38294                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38295                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38296                                  
 38297                                  disable_autoexec:
 38298                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38299                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38300                                  
 38301 0000416F F606[DE46]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38302 00004174 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38303 00004176 F606[D446]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38304 0000417B 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38305 0000417D 800E[D446]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38306                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38307 00004182 810E[DE46]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38308 00004188 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38309                                  dae_1:
 38310                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38311 0000418B A0[1346]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38312                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38313 0000418E 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38314 00004190 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38315 00004192 8A1E[1446]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38316 00004196 B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38317 00004198 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38318 0000419A 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38319 0000419D 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38320 000041A0 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38321 000041A2 881E[1446]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38322 000041A6 81C3[1546]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38323 000041AA 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38324                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38325 000041AB 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38326 000041AE 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38327 000041B0 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38328 000041B1 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38329 000041B3 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38330                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38331 000041B6 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38332                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38333                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38334 000041B9 C3                              retn
 38335

 38387 000041E8 7413                    	je	short delim_ret

 38390 000041EA 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.

 38474                                  ; 
 38475                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38476                                  ;
 38477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38478                                  
 38479                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38480                                  
 38481                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38482                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38483                                  mapcase:
 38484 0000421E 51                      	push	cx
 38485 0000421F 56                      	push	si
 38486 00004220 1E                      	push	ds
 38487                                  
 38488 00004221 06                      	push	es
 38489 00004222 1F                      	pop	ds
 38490                                  
 38491                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38492                                  
 38493                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38494                                  
 38495                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38496 00004223 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38497                                  ;else
 38498                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38499                                  ;endif
 38500                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38501                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38502                                  	;xor	si, si
 38503                                  
 38504                                  convloop:
 38505 00004225 AC                      	lodsb
 38506 00004226 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38507 00004228 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38508 0000422A 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38509 0000422C 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38510 0000422E 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38511 00004230 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38512                                  noconv:
 38513                                  
 38514                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38515                                  
 38516                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38517                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38518                                  
 38519                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38520                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38521                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38522                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38523                                  ;
 38524 00004233 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38525 00004236 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38526 00004238 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38527 0000423A 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38528                                  check_eol:
 38529 0000423C 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38530 0000423E 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38531 00004240 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38532 00004242 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38533                                  ;endif
 38534                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38535 00004244 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38536                                  convdone:
 38537 00004246 1F                      	pop	ds
 38538 00004247 5E                      	pop	si
 38539 00004248 59                      	pop	cx
 38540 00004249 C3                      	retn

 38543                                  ;
 38544                                  ; procedure : round
 38545                                  ;
 38546                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 38547                                  ; perform bounds check.
 38548                                  ;
 38549                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38550                                  
 38551                                  round:
 38552                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38553 0000424A 1E                      	push	ds
 38554 0000424B 0E                      	push	cs
 38555 0000424C 1F                      	pop	ds
 38556                                  
 38557 0000424D 50                      	push	ax
 38558                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 38559 0000424E A1[6203]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 38560                                  
 38561 00004251 E8DBCE                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 38562                                  
 38563                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 38564 00004254 0106[6403]              	add	[memhi],ax
 38565                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 38566 00004258 C706[6203]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 38567                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 38568 0000425E A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 38569                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 38570 00004261 3B06[A502]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]

 38641                                  todigit:
 38642 000042B5 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 38643                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 38644                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38645 000042B7 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 38646                                  	;cmp	al,9
 38647                                  	;ja	short notdig
 38648                                  	;clc
 38649                                  	;retn
 38650                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38651 000042B9 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 38652 000042BB F5                      	cmc
 38653                                  notdig:
 38654                                  	;stc
 38655                                  notdig2:
 38656 000042BC C3                      	retn

 38658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38659                                  ;
 38660                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38661                                  ;
 38662                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38663                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38664                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38665                                  ;
 38666                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38667                                  
 38668                                  getnum:
 38669 000042BD 53                      	push	bx
 38670 000042BE 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38671                                  b2:
 38672 000042C0 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38673 000042C3 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38674                                  
 38675 000042C5 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38676 000042C6 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38677                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38678                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38679 000042C7 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38680 000042C9 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38681 000042CB 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38682 000042CC 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38683 000042CE 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38684 000042D1 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38685                                  
 38686 000042D3 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38687                                  
 38688 000042D4 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 38689 000042D7 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38690 000042D9 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38691 000042DB 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38692 000042DD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38693 000042DF 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38694 000042E1 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38695 000042E3 7417                    	je	short b15
 38696 000042E5 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38697 000042EA 7410                    	je	short b15
 38698 000042EC 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38699                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38700                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38701                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38702                                  	;nop
 38703 000042EE 740C                    	je	short b15
 38704 000042F0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38705 000042F2 7408                    	je	short b15
 38706 000042F4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38707 000042F6 7404                    	je	short b15
 38708 000042F8 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38709 000042FA 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38710                                  b15:
 38711 000042FC 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38712 00004301 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38713                                  b1:
 38714 00004306 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38715 00004308 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38716 0000430A 5B                      	pop	bx
 38717 0000430B C3                      	retn
 38718                                  badnum:
 38719                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38720                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38721 0000430C 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38722                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38723 0000430E 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38724 00004312 5B                      	pop	bx
 38725 00004313 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38726 00004314 C3                      	retn
 38727
