 38729                                  
 38730                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38731                                  
 38732                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38733                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38734                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38735                                  ;	si = 0
 38736                                  ;	ax = country id
 38737                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38738                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38739                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38740                                  ;
 38741                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38742                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38743                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38744                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38745                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38746                                  
 38747                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38748                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38749                                  
 38750                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38751                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)
 38752                                  
 38753 00004315 57                      	push	di
 38754 00004316 50                      	push	ax
 38755 00004317 52                      	push	dx
 38756                                  
 38757 00004318 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38758 0000431A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38759 0000431C B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38760 0000431F E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38761 00004322 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38762                                  
 38763 00004324 06                      	push	es
 38764 00004325 56                      	push	si
 38765                                  
 38766 00004326 0E                      	push	cs
 38767 00004327 07                      	pop	es
 38768                                  
 38769 00004328 BF[7945]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38770 0000432B B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38771 0000432E F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38772                                  
 38773 00004330 5E                      	pop	si
 38774 00004331 07                      	pop	es
 38775 00004332 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38776                                  
 38777 00004334 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38778 00004337 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38779 0000433A 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38780                                  
 38781 0000433C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38782 0000433D 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38783 0000433F 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38784 00004342 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38785 00004345 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38786 00004348 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38787                                  
 38788 0000434A 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38789 0000434C 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38790 00004350 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38791                                  
 38792 00004352 46                      	inc	si
 38793 00004353 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38794 00004354 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38795 00004355 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 38796 00004356 5F                      	pop	di
 38797                                  
 38798                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 38799 00004357 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 38800 0000435A 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 38801                                  
 38802                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 38803                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 38804                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38805 0000435C 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 38806 0000435E 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 38807 00004360 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 38808 00004363 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 38809                                  
 38810                                  setdoscntry_next:
 38811 00004365 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 38812 00004367 46                      	inc	si
 38813 00004368 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 38814 00004369 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 38815                                  
 38816                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 38817                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38818 0000436B 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 38819                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 38820 0000436C F9                      	stc
 38821 0000436D C3                      	retn
 38822                                  
 38823                                  setdosdata_fail:
 38824 0000436E 5E                      	pop	si
 38825 0000436F 59                      	pop	cx
 38826 00004370 5F                      	pop	di
 38827 00004371 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 38828                                  
 38829                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 38830 00004373 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 38831                                  
 38832                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 38833 00004376 2E8916[8145]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 38834 0000437B 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 38835 0000437E 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 38836 00004381 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 38837 00004384 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 38838 00004387 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 38839                                  
 38840 00004389 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 38841 0000438B 46                      	inc	si
 38842 0000438C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 38843                                  
 38844                                  setdoscntry_data:
 38845 0000438D 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38846 0000438E 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 38847 0000438F 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 38848                                  
 38849 00004390 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 38850 00004393 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 38851 00004396 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 38852                                  
 38853 00004398 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 38854 0000439B 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38855 0000439E B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38856 000043A1 F9                      	stc
 38857 000043A2 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38858 000043A4 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38859                                  
 38860 000043A6 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38861 000043A9 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 38862 000043AC B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 38863 000043AE F9                      	stc
 38864 000043AF CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 38865 000043B1 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 38866                                  
 38867 000043B3 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38868 000043B5 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 38869                                  
 38870 000043B7 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 38871 000043BA 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38872 000043BD B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38873 000043C0 F9                      	stc
 38874 000043C1 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 38875 000043C3 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38876                                  
 38877 000043C5 56                      	push	si
 38878 000043C6 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 38879 000043C9 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 38880 000043CB 5E                      	pop	si
 38881 000043CC BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38882 000043CF 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 38883 000043D2 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 38884 000043D4 F9                      	stc
 38885 000043D5 CD21                    	int	21h
 38886 000043D7 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38887                                  
 38888 000043D9 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38889 000043DB 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 38890                                  
 38891 000043DD 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 38892 000043E0 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 38893 000043E3 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 38894 000043E5 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 38895 000043E6 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 38896 000043E7 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 38897 000043EB 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38898                                  
 38899                                  	;if	bugfix
 38900 000043ED E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 38901                                  	;endif
 38902                                  
 38903 000043F0 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 38904 000043F2 7511                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 38905                                  
 38906 000043F4 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 38907                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 38908 000043F8 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 38909                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 38910

 38912                                  
 38913                                  	;push	ax

 38915                                  	;mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 38916                                  	;pop	ax
 38917                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38918 000043FD 2EFF36[8145]            	push	word [cs:cntrycodepage_id]
 38919 00004402 8F4404                  	pop	word [si+4]
 38920

 38928                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 38929 00004410 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 38930                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 38931

 38934 00004415 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left

 38937 00004419 46                      	inc	si

 38942                                  	;cmp	cx,0

 38992                                  
 38993                                  getcountrydestination:
 38994                                  
 38995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38996                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38997                                  ;
 38998                                  ;input: al - data id
 38999                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39000                                  ;on return:
 39001                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 39002                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 39003                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39004                                  
 39005                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39006                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 39007                                  
 39008                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39009                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 39010                                  
 39011 0000443A 51                      	push	cx
 39012                                  	;add	di,74
 39013 0000443B 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 39014                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 39015 0000443E 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 39016 00004441 47                      	inc	di
 39017 00004442 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 39018                                  
 39019                                  getcntrydest:
 39020 00004443 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 39021 00004446 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 39022                                  
 39023 00004448 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 39024 0000444C 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 39025                                  
 39026 0000444E 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 39027 00004451 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 39028                                  
 39029                                  getcntrydest_1:
 39030                                  	;add	di,41
 39031 00004453 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 39032                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 39033 00004456 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 39034 00004458 F9                      	stc
 39035                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 39036                                  getcntrydest_exit:

 39063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39064                                  
 39065                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39066                                  
 39067                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39068                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39069                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39070                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39071                                  ;
 39072                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39073                                  ;	 be moved.
 39074                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39075                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39076                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39077                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39078                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39079                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39080                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39081                                  
 39082 00004465 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39083 00004466 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39084 00004469 F9                      	stc
 39085 0000446A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39086 0000446C 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39087 0000446D 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39088                                  
 39089 0000446F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39090 00004471 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39091 00004473 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39092 00004475 F9                      	stc
 39093 00004476 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39094                                  ricb_exit:
 39095 00004478 C3                      	retn
 39096

 39098                                  
 39099                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39100                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39101                                  %if 0
 39102                                  
 39103                                  set_country_path:
 39104                                  
 39105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39106                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39107                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39108                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39109                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39110                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39111                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39112                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39113                                  
 39114                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39115                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39116                                  
 39117                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39118                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39119                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39120                                  
 39121                                  	push	si
 39122                                  
 39123                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39124                                  	push	es
 39125                                  	pop	ds
 39126                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39127                                  
 39128                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39129                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39130                                  
 39131                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39132                                  	inc	si
 39133                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39134                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39135                                  
 39136                                  scp_default_drv:
 39137                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39138                                  	int	21h
 39139                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39140                                  
 39141                                  scp_setdrv:
 39142                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39143                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39144                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39145                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39146                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39147                                  
 39148                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39149                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39150                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39151                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39152                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39153                                  
 39154                                  scp_root_dir:
 39155                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39156                                  scp_path:
 39157                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39158                                  
 39159                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39160                                  scpath_exit:
 39161                                  
 39162                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39163                                  	push	es
 39164                                  	pop	ds
 39165                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39166                                  
 39167                                  	pop	si
 39168                                  	retn
 39169                                  
 39170                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39171                                  
 39172                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39173                                  
 39174                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39175                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39176                                  ;carry set if not.
 39177                                  
 39178                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39179                                  
 39180                                  	push	ax
 39181                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39182                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39183                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39184                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39185                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39186                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39187                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39188                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39189                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39190                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39191                                  
 39192                                  cdletter_no:
 39193                                  	stc
 39194                                  cdletter_exit:
 39195                                  	pop	ax
 39196                                  	retn
 39197                                  
 39198                                  %endif
 39199

 39204                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target

 39206                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 39207                                  
 39208                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39209                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)

 39213                                  	; 10/09/2023

 39218 0000447D 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
